Description: Located atop Pittsburgh's most famous vantage point, this revitalized Historic Landmark is the neighborhood's first contemporary loft-style apartments. Boasting 67 units of modern, urban living - studio, 1-Bedroom, 2-Bedroom, 3-Bedroom, and 1-2-Bedroom Townhouse units housed in the former Prospect School (1931), an Art Deco-style building listed on the National Register of Historic Places. It is within walking distance of both the Grandview Avenue and Shiloh Street commercial districts as well as Emerald View Park, which has miles of hiking trails featuring panoramic views of the city. Residents will have an easy, visually-inspiring, commute to downtown via the Monongahela Incline or by car via the PJ McArdle Roadway. Tenants pay an additional fee's for parking($45.00/month) and water ($45.00/month). Our Pet Fee is a non-refundable $250 upon move in, then $25/month per pet.12 months

Description: Experience the best in luxury living with breathtaking creek and woodland views offering plenty of privacy, not often found in apartment living. Our unique Upper St. Clair community and friendly management team provide you with a serene, yet energetic atmosphere that you will look forward to coming home to each day. Torrente is located in the #1 school district in Western Pennsylvania, Upper St. Clair. This historic community was founded in 1762 and has been a community rich in pride and history ever since. We offer an exceptional location within this community, thoughtfully nestled within Upper St. Clair and close to all the your everyday conveniences as South Hills Village Mall and Whole Foods. Our Residents enjoy a wide array of popular amenities, such as: on-site maintenance with no maintenance fees, on-site storage, garage and underground parking facilities, a 24-Hour Fitness Center, as well as elevators in all the buildings and so much more!

Description:
2 BEDROOMS ; 1.5 BATHROOMS + DEN. 1585 Sq. Feet/147 Sq. Meters

FURNISHED, UTILITIES INCLUDED first-floor apt has lots of closet space. Walking distance to grocery store, pharmacy, bank, gym, Frick Park, and restaurants. P71 bus stop to downtown Pittsburgh is 200 feet away and the 61B bus to Sq. Hill and Oakland is .275 miles/.44 km away. Parkway entrance and East Busway are nearby. Quick and easy access to local universities and businesses (3 miles/4.8 KM from CMU. Also, 3.5 miles/5.63 KM from Pitt's Cathedral of Learning, and 2.7 miles/4.35KM from Bakery Square).

Two bedrooms each have a queen-sized bed. The third is furnished as a TV/study room. Two TVs (one is 37") with cable provided, including HBO and strong Wi-Fi for your computer(s). Utilities are included, except for phone, as well as free-use of the washer and dryer in the basement (no quarters needed:).

Silverware/Dishes/Pots/Pans/Towels/Coffee Maker/Can Opener/Toaster/Blender/Microwave ALL provided. Renter just needs to have a phone. Owner pays for gas, electric, Wi-Fi, cable, water, trash, and sewer.

Lease Terms:

$1380.00/Month ($690 a person when shared) w/eight months or greater lease 
$1480.00/Month for short-term lease ( 7 months or fewer)
$2000.00 Deposit ($1,000 a person, if shared)

Lease Length: One Year Preferred/Short-term considered for $1480 a month
Available: 04/24/2021 - Sign an 8 month or more lease and get the rest of April FREE 

Amenities:

Air Conditioning - one 12,000 BTU unit to cool most of the place, and a 5,000 BTU one 
Quiet Bosch Dishwasher
Fully Furnished - with a minimum three-month lease a bed could be put in our garage to turn the second bedroom into an office, workout space, or whatever
Microwave
Oven
Refrigerator
Cable with HBO included
Strong Wi-Fi
Bicycle Parking
Faux Fireplace
Lovely Porch (WiFi works there too!)
Near Frick Park (1.2 miles away)
Off-Street Parking
Security Cameras

This first-floor apartment with the ramp in the back has good accessibility overall for someone who may have some mobility issues except for the den's opening, which is less than 32" wide. 

Conveniently located in the East End in Swissvale near Swisshelm Park/Squirrel Hill and Regent Square/Edgewood. 

Again, renter just needs to pay to have a phone. The owner pays for electric, gas, Wi-Fi, cable, water, trash, and sewer. Plus, a washer and dryer, just one floor below from this apartment, are free to use.

Description: Experience the difference. Experience The Alden South Hills. The community is under new ownership and new management with a whole new look. Our newly renovated apartment homes offer comfort, style and convenience. The open floor plans are perfect for entertaining. Your new modern appliances and designer kitchens will be the envy of your friends. Our renovations do not just end with the apartment. Not only will you love to show off your new home, but The Alden is the only community in Pittsburgh to have a stunning NEW 15,000 square foot clubhouse with resident business center and conference room, clubroom for lounging around and a private terrace that overlooks the pool. All of our valued residents will be able to relax poolside with a shimmering pool and sun deck. A great place to escape on a hot day. You will be able to stay fit in our state of the art fitness center! We love pets and we\u0027re the perfect place for you and your four legged friends. Located on 56 park like acres, you have tons of space to take your dog for a walk. The community has two convenient playgrounds, a basketball court with multiple grilling and picnic areas. Your South Hills location is a commuter\u0027s dream. You are just a 5 minute drive to the Library Street T station, just minutes from downtown Pittsburgh, I-376, I-79 and I-51 and multiple bus stops are located throughout the community. Experience a whole new lifestyle! 24 Hour Emergency Maintenance, Baldwin-Whitehall School District, Breakfast Bars Available, Community and Private Garages Available, Convenient to Shopping and Restaurants, Cozy Resident Lounge with Business Center and Meeting Room, Decorative Ceiling Fans, Designer Kitchens in Select Apartments, Fixed Water Rates, Granite Like Counter Tops with New Lighting, High-speed Internet, Individual Climate Control, Laundry Care Center in Every Building, Microwave (Select Units), New Clubhouse and Fitness Center Now Open!!!, New Kitchens Available, One, Two and Three Bedroom Units Available, Online Maintenance Requests, Online Payments and Credit Cards Accepted, Online Rent Payment and Resident Portal, Other, Pet friendly, Pets Welcome ( Weight limit for Apts & Townhomes: Breed Restrictions Apply), Picnic Areas with Grilling Stations, Public Transportation On-Site, Relaxing Sundeck with FREE WiFi, Renovated Bathrooms with a Pedastal Sink, Renovated Kitchens with Full Size Black Appliances, Shimmering Outdoor Pool, Spacious Floor Plans, Two Fantastic Playgrounds, Under New Management and Ownership, Wall to Wall Carpet, Washer/Dryers in Select Apartments

Description: Holiday Park is well-planned, self contained community that\u0027s an integral part of the Pittsburgh area. Within minutes of Holiday Park you will find excellent schools, public transportation, shopping, medical offices, recreation, sports programs, day care facilities and fitness facilities. Located off of Route 286 to Business 22 you will find it convenient to the Pennsylvania Turnpike, the Parkway East, Pittsburgh, Greensburg, Oakland, Shadyside and Squirrel Hill. Enjoy a night out at the Waterfront or South side. Close to the Monroeville Mall you will find great shopping, entertainment and wonderful restaurants. A few of the many highlights of our townhomes include patios, garages, and the conveniences of in house laundry rooms, many include full size washers and dryers. Some of the apartment homes have private balconies for you to relax and enjoy your leisure moments. We also have laundry facilities and off street parking. The two and three bedroom luxury townhomes, nestled in an elegant setting, offer 2.5 baths, eat-in kitchens, dining rooms, garage, balcony and a fireplace. Holiday Park Apartments and Townhomes, we are always there for you. Take advantage of our gift to you when you make your home with us. (All new one year leases include one year membership to YMCA.) You\u0027ll appreciate the Property Concierge Advantage with dedicated and attentive staff, available 24 hours daily. On-site service personnel assures that your living experience at Holiday Park Apartments and Townhomes is enjoyable and carefree. 24 Hour Emergency Maintenance, Balconies and Patios in Select Homes, Close to PA Turnpike and Parkway East, Employer Discounts, Finished Basements - Select Homes, Located near Plum, Monroeville & Murrysville, One & Two Car Garages *Select Units, Pet Friendly (Restrictions Apply), Some with Gas Fireplace, Some with Vaulted Ceilings and Skylights, Storage Available in Select Homes, Upgraded Kitchens, Washer/Dryer Included in Select Homes

Description: Studio Apartment at 423 S. Highland Avenue S5 - Five S. Highland Avenue is a cute studio apartment on the second floor. Up two carpeted flights of stairs, the apartment opens into a cute micro-study perfect for a little work space. A trio of tall and wide windows brighten the main room, which looks over the front lawn of this S. Highland Avenue building. Trees and pleasant residences surround you, but you'll still be just blocks from a variety of shops and restaurants. Carnegie Mellon University, Chatham University, UPMC Shadyside, and the University of Pittsburgh are all well within two miles. The apartment features a fully equipped kitchen. A cream-colored restroom with full bathtub and shower is situated in the back. Description: Situated between the residential neighborhoods of North Oakland and Shadyside, the King Edward is the ideal location in Pittsburgh. Three blocks from the University of Pittsburgh, four blocks from the Carnegie Mellon, and a mere eight blocks from Walnut Street, this luxurious building boasts spacious apartments in an ideal location. Imagine the daily enjoyment of the King Edward’s majestic splendor and architectural details. It’s everything you want in urban living: convenient location, unique apartments with style, character, and storage space. Description: Hobart Court is a no-brainer if you're looking for a comfortable apartment in an ideal location. The building has attractive curb appeal with well-kept landscaping and outdoor space in the courtyard. It holds one and two bedroom units with a handful of different floor plans to choose from. Most units have up-to-date kitchens and bathrooms, large living areas, as well as considerably bright windows. Some units feature original fireplaces, wood-inspired flooring, and ample closet space. Hobart Court has all the makings of a cozy apartment, and the location is the cherry on top! Only five minutes from the campuses of PITT and CMU, just down the road from Schenley Park, and within walking distance to Squirrel Hill's main strip, Murray Ave, you can easily walk to the grocery store, take a stroll to grab a cup of coffee, or to pick up that take-out you've been craving. Plus, there is a Healthy Ride Bike Station nearby and Hobart Court is a stop on Walnut Capital's resident shuttle route that goes around Pittsburgh's East End! You're a student? Lucky you! There are stops at CMU and PITT.

Description: Welcome Home to Morgan at North ShoreMorgan at North Shore apartments are nestled along the Allegheny River across from Downtown Pittsburgh, PA. Live less than 1 mile from Heinz Field and PNC Park. Our apartments offer residents the suburban apartment feel in a private urban setting. Inside our one and two-bedroom apartments, you will find wood-style plank flooring, oversized closets & storage, washer & dryer, kitchen with pantry, and a private patio or balcony. We also have a two-bedroom with a den, perfect for a home office or extra room for quests! Residents come home to a clubhouse with resident lounge, resort-style heated pool, fitness center, grilling station, multiple green-space areas, and business center. Residents also have direct access to the Three Rivers Heritage Trail. Our Pittsburgh apartments are located in a fantastic location and offer everything you need to feel right at home!

Description: A distinct Pittsburgh landmark, constructed in 1921 in the midst of the downtown skyline and the Monongahela River, Terminal 21 originated as a focal point where produce and livestock met rail and industrial industries. The decades have seen this freight terminal and warehouse shift in focus to residential living, and its industrial form has long resonated with visitors and residents.Originally put to a different, industrial use, but now re-purposed to meet the current needs of a constantly evolving city, Terminal 21 fits with Pittsburghs culture of reinvention. Industry was once the heart that drove the energy of the city. Now, the emerging technological economy means room for growth within the community and for the professionals who live in it.With a comfortable modern feel inspired by the sites local heritage and history, Terminal 21 allows you to make the most of urban living. Centrally located, and primed for easy access to attractions and events throughout the city, Terminal 21 is still the center of a vibrant community and a welcoming stop on lifes journey.

Description: Holiday Park is well-planned, self contained community that\u0027s an integral part of the Pittsburgh area. Within minutes of Holiday Park you will find excellent schools, public transportation, shopping, medical offices, recreation, sports programs, day care facilities and fitness facilities. Located off of Route 286 to Business 22 you will find it convenient to the Pennsylvania Turnpike, the Parkway East, Pittsburgh, Greensburg, Oakland, Shadyside and Squirrel Hill. Enjoy a night out at the Waterfront or South side. Close to the Monroeville Mall you will find great shopping, entertainment and wonderful restaurants. A few of the many highlights of our townhomes include patios, garages, and the conveniences of in house laundry rooms, many include full size washers and dryers. Some of the apartment homes have private balconies for you to relax and enjoy your leisure moments. We also have laundry facilities and off street parking. The two and three bedroom luxury townhomes, nestled in an elegant setting, offer 2.5 baths, eat-in kitchens, dining rooms, garage, balcony and a fireplace. Holiday Park Apartments and Townhomes, we are always there for you. Take advantage of our gift to you when you make your home with us. (All new one year leases include one year membership to YMCA.) You\u0027ll appreciate the Property Concierge Advantage with dedicated and attentive staff, available 24 hours daily. On-site service personnel assures that your living experience at Holiday Park Apartments and Townhomes is enjoyable and carefree. 24 Hour Emergency Maintenance, Balconies and Patios in Select Homes, Close to PA Turnpike and Parkway East, Employer Discounts, Finished Basements - Select Homes, Located near Plum, Monroeville & Murrysville, One & Two Car Garages *Select Units, Pet Friendly (Restrictions Apply), Some with Gas Fireplace, Some with Vaulted Ceilings and Skylights, Storage Available in Select Homes, Upgraded Kitchens, Washer/Dryer Included in Select Homes

Description: A distinct Pittsburgh landmark, constructed in 1921 in the midst of the downtown skyline and the Monongahela River, Terminal 21 originated as a focal point where produce and livestock met rail and industrial industries. The decades have seen this freight terminal and warehouse shift in focus to residential living, and its industrial form has long resonated with visitors and residents.Originally put to a different, industrial use, but now re-purposed to meet the current needs of a constantly evolving city, Terminal 21 fits with Pittsburghs culture of reinvention. Industry was once the heart that drove the energy of the city. Now, the emerging technological economy means room for growth within the community and for the professionals who live in it.With a comfortable modern feel inspired by the sites local heritage and history, Terminal 21 allows you to make the most of urban living. Centrally located, and primed for easy access to attractions and events throughout the city, Terminal 21 is still the center of a vibrant community and a welcoming stop on lifes journey.

Kaufmann's Grand on Fifth offers the most stylish and historic living in the heart of downtown Pittsburgh. Located in the iconic Kaufmann building, Kaufmann's Grand on Fifth mixes the beauties of the past with the luxuries of today. Description: Escape the commotion and savor the serene atmosphere of the Woodhawk Club Apartments. Nestled in a wooded area in the North Hills of Pittsburgh, our community offers all of the conveniences of city life with the quietude of the urban lifestyle. We offer one and two bedroom apartments equipped with private balconies or patios, in apartment washers and dryers and wood burning fireplaces in select units. The clubhouse is ideal for gatherings and features a big screen TV, bar, indoor hot tub and swimming pool. Other amenities include a lighted tennis court, racquetball court, basketball courts and a fitness center. Located just off of McKnight Road, shopping and dining are only minutes away. Commuters will find our community ideal since it is only 15 minutes from downtown Pittsburgh. The office is open 7 days a week for the convenience of our residents and prospective residents. Our friendly staff is available to answer any questions and to make your move as easy as possible. Contact us today to arrange a tour.

Description: The Foundry at 41st is bravely setting new standards for apartment living. Come home to comfort, luxury and endless amenities. Choose from a variety of stylish studios, one or two-bedroom apartments adorned with everything you'd expect from an upscale, resort-style community. Enjoy high-end features and finishes in your unit, a considerate amount of amenities, and contemporary decor designed around Pittsburgh's steel industry and the history of the former foundry located at the apartment building's site.Join us and embrace the mixture of history and modernity in a community that entwines Lawrenceville's industrial roots and evokes a trendy, urban vibe. From the secured parking garage to the well-equipped fitness center, grilling stations, and picnic areas, we've cautiously thought of all the details that offer our residents privacy, security, serenity, and fun. Hang out with friends on the rooftop terrace, quiet your mind in the yoga studio, or get the feeling of a permanent weekend getaway by spending some quality time by the pool. With the extensive list of amenities, there's something for every resident to enjoy.Our exceptional, riverfront location is just minutes from downtown Pittsburgh and popular Butler Street in the Lawrenceville neighborhood of Pittsburgh, PA or, according to TIME Money, the coolest neighborhood in America right now. The shops, restaurants, and bars within walking distance are sure to spice up your social life. And the boutiques, coffee shops and theatres offer a different vibe to mingle with your neighbors.The neighborhood, amenities, and dedicated staff make The Foundry one of the most desirable places to rent in Pittsburgh, PA. Description: Shadyside Commons offers newly renovated 1- and 2- bedroom apartments that combine a contemporary living space with a peaceful environment in the coveted Shadyside neighborhood of Pittsburgh. Built in 1903, the building was constructed as a hardware store for Pittsburgh businessman John Bindle and, over a century later, the 4-story brick building still flaunts its unusually sharp style and quality details. Large brick arches, handsome cornices and oversized industrial windows couple with proximity to downtown Pittsburgh to create your perfect luxury residence. Apartments include modern kitchens and baths, ample closet space with adjustable shelving and custom storage, and in-suite washers \u0026 dryers. Description: The FLATS on FIFTH is a new 74 unit luxury community located in the Uptown neighborhood of Pittsburgh and just a short walk to PPG Paints Arena, Duquesne University, UPMC Mercy Hospital and the bustling business district of Downtown Pittsburgh. Amenities include a front desk attendant, lounge, conference/ business center, pet washing facility, gym,package room, bicycle storage & repair station, flat screen TV's & free WiFi in common areas, & garage parking (for a fee). The units include sliding barn doors,washers & dryers, wood grain luxury vinyl flooring, fully equipped kitchens with granite counter tops, electric stoves, disposals, dishwashers, microwaves & refrigerators, large closets and bathrooms, sliding glass doors and or balconies, and electric heat & central air. The FLATS on FIFTH welcomes Pets and offers long & short term leases, furnished and non-furnished units and ADA compatible units. Conveniently located near the hottest restaurants in the city, the sports arenas, concert & art centers, water ways, biking, running & walking trails, public transportation, several universities, hospitals, and interstates 376 & 279.

Description: Holiday Park is well-planned, self contained community that\u0027s an integral part of the Pittsburgh area. Within minutes of Holiday Park you will find excellent schools, public transportation, shopping, medical offices, recreation, sports programs, day care facilities and fitness facilities. Located off of Route 286 to Business 22 you will find it convenient to the Pennsylvania Turnpike, the Parkway East, Pittsburgh, Greensburg, Oakland, Shadyside and Squirrel Hill. Enjoy a night out at the Waterfront or South side. Close to the Monroeville Mall you will find great shopping, entertainment and wonderful restaurants. A few of the many highlights of our townhomes include patios, garages, and the conveniences of in house laundry rooms, many include full size washers and dryers. Some of the apartment homes have private balconies for you to relax and enjoy your leisure moments. We also have laundry facilities and off street parking. The two and three bedroom luxury townhomes, nestled in an elegant setting, offer 2.5 baths, eat-in kitchens, dining rooms, garage, balcony and a fireplace. Holiday Park Apartments and Townhomes, we are always there for you. Take advantage of our gift to you when you make your home with us. (All new one year leases include one year membership to YMCA.) You\u0027ll appreciate the Property Concierge Advantage with dedicated and attentive staff, available 24 hours daily. On-site service personnel assures that your living experience at Holiday Park Apartments and Townhomes is enjoyable and carefree. 24 Hour Emergency Maintenance, Balconies and Patios in Select Homes, Close to PA Turnpike and Parkway East, Employer Discounts, Finished Basements - Select Homes, Located near Plum, Monroeville & Murrysville, One & Two Car Garages *Select Units, Pet Friendly (Restrictions Apply), Some with Gas Fireplace, Some with Vaulted Ceilings and Skylights, Storage Available in Select Homes, Upgraded Kitchens, Washer/Dryer Included in Select Homes

Kaufmann's Grand on Fifth offers the most stylish and historic living in the heart of downtown Pittsburgh. Located in the iconic Kaufmann building, Kaufmann's Grand on Fifth mixes the beauties of the past with the luxuries of today. Studio, one and two-bedroom apartments are beautifully appointed with contemporary finishes and features including over-sized windows, open kitchens and stainless steel appliances. Description: Mount Washington This is a 1/2 duplex (side by side), Has air conditioning, Hardwood-like floors. Walk in from your front porch to a nice size living room then into your dining room and behind the dining room is your kitchen which includes a refrigerator, stove, and a porch. Description: Hobart Court is a no-brainer if you're looking for a comfortable apartment in an ideal location. The building has attractive curb appeal with well-kept landscaping and outdoor space in the courtyard. It holds one and two bedroom units with a handful of different floor plans to choose from. Most units have up-to-date kitchens and bathrooms, large living areas, as well as considerably bright windows. Some units feature original fireplaces, wood-inspired flooring, and ample closet space. Hobart Court has all the makings of a cozy apartment, and the location is the cherry on top! Only five minutes from the campuses of PITT and CMU, just down the road from Schenley Park, and within walking distance to Squirrel Hill's main strip, Murray Ave, you can easily walk to the grocery store, take a stroll to grab a cup of coffee, or to pick up that take-out you've been craving. Plus, there is a Healthy Ride Bike Station nearby and Hobart Court is a stop on Walnut Capital's resident shuttle route that goes around Pittsburgh's East End! You're a student? Lucky you! There are stops at CMU and PITT.

Description: Originally known as the Commonwealth Trust Bank, this historic tower has been serving the people of Downtown Pittsburgh for over a hundred years. Today, the building has been reborn—with stunning, light-filled modern apartment homes and amazing amenities, all within a timeless monument right in Pittsburgh’s Fourth Avenue Historic District. Throughout the iconic tower, you’ll find some of the best amenity spaces in Pittsburgh. Come explore, and you’ll find a stunning outdoor roof terrace, a 2-story club \u0026 game room, and even a bicycle garage tucked away in the bank’s original vault. With a completely reimagined interior and unbelievable skyline and river views, The Commonwealth Building has become home to stunning boutique living spaces that combine the best of both worlds—old-world craftsmanship, with modern simplicity and style. Clubroom, Den, Library/Billiards Room, On-site Management, Package Lockers, Roofdeck with Grilling Station, Storage Lockers, Terrace

Description: The Brix at 26, a Hudson Property, ties historic architecture and modern, upscale boutique living, while offering residents immediate access to the luxuries of the Southside Works area of Pittsburgh. Originally constructed in 1908 for Pittsburgh Mercantile Company and renovated into a beautiful apartment community in 2013, The Brix at 26 preserves the history of the building in a modern and progressive way. Residents indulge in casual sophistication while enjoying everything this beautiful and exciting area has to offer! The Brix at 26 is ideally located within the Southside Works area and is within walking distance to the riverfront trail and many of the best restaurants and nightlife that the Southside has to offer. \n\nWoof Woof, Meow Meow! Description:
This is the first floor of a half duplex located in one of the most sought after neighborhoods in Pittsburgh. It was renovated in July of 2018 and features plenty of closet space, hardwood floors, and ceiling fans in the bedroom and living room. The kitchen and bathroom have recently been remodeled with granite counters and ceramic tile. It has a private front and back door, off street parking, and private laundry and ample storage in the basement. 
Landlord pays water, sewage, and trash disposal. Tenant pays gas and electric. 
This apartment complex is located in one of the most sought after neighbors in Pittsburgh. a block off Fifth Avenue from Mellon Park and the bus stop. Bakery Square, Trader Joe's, Giant Eagle, Target, Whole Foods, etc. are just a couple blocks away. There is a large shared yard, perfect for pets. Description: A distinct Pittsburgh landmark, constructed in 1921 in the midst of the downtown skyline and the Monongahela River, Terminal 21 originated as a focal point where produce and livestock met rail and industrial industries. The decades have seen this freight terminal and warehouse shift in focus to residential living, and its industrial form has long resonated with visitors and residents.Originally put to a different, industrial use, but now re-purposed to meet the current needs of a constantly evolving city, Terminal 21 fits with Pittsburghs culture of reinvention. Industry was once the heart that drove the energy of the city. Now, the emerging technological economy means room for growth within the community and for the professionals who live in it.With a comfortable modern feel inspired by the sites local heritage and history, Terminal 21 allows you to make the most of urban living. Centrally located, and primed for easy access to attractions and events throughout the city, Terminal 21 is still the center of a vibrant community and a welcoming stop on lifes journey.

Description: Originally known as the Commonwealth Trust Bank, this historic tower has been serving the people of Downtown Pittsburgh for over a hundred years. Today, the building has been rebornwith stunning, light-filled modern apartment homes and amazing amenities, all within a timeless monument right in Pittsburghs Fourth Avenue Historic District. Throughout the iconic tower, youll find some of the best amenity spaces in Pittsburgh. Come explore, and youll find a stunning outdoor roof terrace, a 2-story club \u0026 game room, and even a bicycle garage tucked away in the banks original vault. With a completely reimagined interior and unbelievable skyline and river views, The Commonwealth Building has become home to stunning boutique living spaces that combine the best of both worldsold-world craftsmanship, with modern simplicity and style. Clubroom, Den, Library/Billiards Room, On-site Management, Package Lockers, Roofdeck with Grilling Station, Storage Lockers, Terrace

Description: Located atop Pittsburgh's most famous vantage point, this revitalized Historic Landmark is the neighborhood's first contemporary loft-style apartments. Boasting 67 units of modern, urban living - studio, 1-Bedroom, 2-Bedroom, 3-Bedroom, and 1-2-Bedroom Townhouse units housed in the former Prospect School (1931), an Art Deco-style building listed on the National Register of Historic Places. It is within walking distance of both the Grandview Avenue and Shiloh Street commercial districts as well as Emerald View Park, which has miles of hiking trails featuring panoramic views of the city. Residents will have an easy, visually-inspiring, commute to downtown via the Monongahela Incline or by car via the PJ McArdle Roadway. Tenants pay an additional fee's for parking($45.00/month) and water ($45.00/month). Our Pet Fee is a non-refundable $250 upon move in, then $25/month per pet.12 months

Description:
Spacious renovated home located in Squirrel Hill/Greenfield -- just listed for rental!. 

Main level 
- Living room and dining room, both with hardwood floors 
- Kitchen with maple cabinets and newer appliances (gas range, dishwasher, side-by-side refrigerator, disposal) 
- Entry area with large closet 
- Updated powder room

Second level 
- 3 large bedrooms with neutral carpet, each with a large closet. The master bedroom features a walk-in closet. 
- Bathroom - fully tiled in ceramic - with tub and vanity 

Basement
- Clean and well-lit walk out basement with plenty of storage space
- Newer washer and electric dryer (free for your use!)

Outdoor spaces 
- Covered front porch 
- Concrete patio in the back
- Deck accessible from kitchen 
- Fully fenced private backyard

Mechanicals 
- Central airconditioning 
- Forced air heat; new high efficiency furnace 
- Multipane windows 
- Updated plumbing and electrical 

Location/Transportation 
- Integral garage
- Plentiful free street parking (no permit required!)
- Bus stop for Port Authority's 58 bus line with frequent routes serving Oakland (including UPMC, CMU and University of Pittsburgh) and Downtown stops practically at your front door 
- Walk to Schenley Park within 5 minutes
- Close to various shopping venues including the Greenfield Giant Eagle, Squirrel Hill/Murray Avenue, Shadyside/Walnut Street, SouthSide/Southside Works and Carson Street, as well as the Waterfront at Homestead
- 1 minute to the 376E/W on-ramps

Available June 1 for $1675 plus utilities. First month's rent and security deposit due at lease signing. Credit check required.

Description: A distinct Pittsburgh landmark, constructed in 1921 in the midst of the downtown skyline and the Monongahela River, Terminal 21 originated as a focal point where produce and livestock met rail and industrial industries. The decades have seen this freight terminal and warehouse shift in focus to residential living, and its industrial form has long resonated with visitors and residents.Originally put to a different, industrial use, but now re-purposed to meet the current needs of a constantly evolving city, Terminal 21 fits with Pittsburghs culture of reinvention. Industry was once the heart that drove the energy of the city. Now, the emerging technological economy means room for growth within the community and for the professionals who live in it.With a comfortable modern feel inspired by the sites local heritage and history, Terminal 21 allows you to make the most of urban living. Centrally located, and primed for easy access to attractions and events throughout the city, Terminal 21 is still the center of a vibrant community and a welcoming stop on lifes journey.

Description: Shadyside Commons offers newly renovated 1- and 2- bedroom apartments that combine a contemporary living space with a peaceful environment in the coveted Shadyside neighborhood of Pittsburgh. Built in 1903, the building was constructed as a hardware store for Pittsburgh businessman John Bindle and, over a century later, the 4-story brick building still flaunts its unusually sharp style and quality details. Large brick arches, handsome cornices and oversized industrial windows couple with proximity to downtown Pittsburgh to create your perfect luxury residence. Apartments include modern kitchens and baths, ample closet space with adjustable shelving and custom storage, and in-suite washers \u0026 dryers. Located near the University of Pittsburgh, UPMC-Shadyside, and Carnegie Mellon, Shadyside Commons offers easy access to the city\u0027s parks, shopping, and restaurants, in the vibrant, yet cozy residential neighborhood of Shadyside. Ample Closet Space with Custom Shelving, Central Air Conditioning, Extra Storage, High Ceilings, High Ceilings with Large Windows, Historic Building, Large Closets, Smoke Free Community, USB Ports

Description: Hobart Court is a no-brainer if you're looking for a comfortable apartment in an ideal location. The building has attractive curb appeal with well-kept landscaping and outdoor space in the courtyard. It holds one and two bedroom units with a handful of different floor plans to choose from. Most units have up-to-date kitchens and bathrooms, large living areas, as well as considerably bright windows. Some units feature original fireplaces, wood-inspired flooring, and ample closet space. Hobart Court has all the makings of a cozy apartment, and the location is the cherry on top! Only five minutes from the campuses of PITT and CMU, just down the road from Schenley Park, and within walking distance to Squirrel Hill's main strip, Murray Ave, you can easily walk to the grocery store, take a stroll to grab a cup of coffee, or to pick up that take-out you've been craving. Plus, there is a Healthy Ride Bike Station nearby and Hobart Court is a stop on Walnut Capital's resident shuttle route that goes around Pittsburgh's East End! You're a student? Lucky you! There are stops at CMU and PITT.

Description:
1 BR Apartment available now on a quiet cul-de-sac with off street parking. Only minutes to Downtown Pittsburgh, AGH, Rivers Casino, Heinz Field, PNC Park, and major interstates. Very large bright rooms with all new carpet and freshly painted. Huge eat in kitchen and a very large office/ Den. Nice large private yard great for summer cookouts. Steps away from bus stop. Lease lengths - 12 Months with one month security deposit. Details regarding this property's Utilities - Resident Pays Electricity, Resident Pays Gas, 50.00 flat fee for water/sewage, trash removal + 25 for each additional person.

Application includes background and credit check. Credit score 650 or above, will consider lower credit score for additional requirements and up to 2 months security deposit. No credit in collection and must have proof of current employment and last 2 pay stubs. No Pets, No smoking.Read less

Description: Studio Apartment at 423 S. Highland Avenue S5 - Five S. Highland Avenue is a cute studio apartment on the second floor. Up two carpeted flights of stairs, the apartment opens into a cute micro-study perfect for a little work space. A trio of tall and wide windows brighten the main room, which looks over the front lawn of this S. Highland Avenue building. Trees and pleasant residences surround you, but you'll still be just blocks from a variety of shops and restaurants. Carnegie Mellon University, Chatham University, UPMC Shadyside, and the University of Pittsburgh are all well within two miles. The apartment features a fully equipped kitchen. A cream-colored restroom with full bathtub and shower is situated in the back. Click here for an immersive 360 VR Tour of the apartment:For more information, click on the link below to visit our website:No Cats Allowed(RLNE5857802)

Description: Holiday Park is well-planned, self contained community that\u0027s an integral part of the Pittsburgh area. Within minutes of Holiday Park you will find excellent schools, public transportation, shopping, medical offices, recreation, sports programs, day care facilities and fitness facilities. Located off of Route 286 to Business 22 you will find it convenient to the Pennsylvania Turnpike, the Parkway East, Pittsburgh, Greensburg, Oakland, Shadyside and Squirrel Hill. Enjoy a night out at the Waterfront or South side. Close to the Monroeville Mall you will find great shopping, entertainment and wonderful restaurants. A few of the many highlights of our townhomes include patios, garages, and the conveniences of in house laundry rooms, many include full size washers and dryers. Some of the apartment homes have private balconies for you to relax and enjoy your leisure moments. We also have laundry facilities and off street parking. The two and three bedroom luxury townhomes, nestled in an elegant setting, offer 2.5 baths, eat-in kitchens, dining rooms, garage, balcony and a fireplace. Holiday Park Apartments and Townhomes, we are always there for you. Take advantage of our gift to you when you make your home with us. (All new one year leases include one year membership to YMCA.) You\u0027ll appreciate the Property Concierge Advantage with dedicated and attentive staff, available 24 hours daily. On-site service personnel assures that your living experience at Holiday Park Apartments and Townhomes is enjoyable and carefree. 24 Hour Emergency Maintenance, Balconies and Patios in Select Homes, Close to PA Turnpike and Parkway East, Employer Discounts, Finished Basements - Select Homes, Located near Plum, Monroeville & Murrysville, One & Two Car Garages *Select Units, Pet Friendly (Restrictions Apply), Some with Gas Fireplace, Some with Vaulted Ceilings and Skylights, Storage Available in Select Homes, Upgraded Kitchens, Washer/Dryer Included in Select Homes

Description:
How would you like to live in this completely renovated Urban Retreat in one of Pittsburgh's hippest neighborhoods? Would "unobstructed skyline views" of the city be appealing to view every night as you drift off to sleep? If so, I have the perfect home for you! This 3 bedroom, 1 bathroom Single Family Home is located on Goettman Street in the heart of one of Pittsburgh's most diverse neighborhoods. 

This residence provides an urban edge along with an artsy atmosphere. Inside this home you'll find a real difference: professional series appliances, designer select finishes and cleverly designed layouts. An open floor plan and plenty of natural light creates a spacious living area. The 2nd floor master bedroom provides a tranquil relaxing atmosphere, which is exactly what you want after a stressful day of work. Other amenities include: 1st floor laundry with a commercial grade utility sink, natural stone bathroom floor, original victorian staircase, a private patio and off street parking. 

Troy Hill's vibrant neighborhood has such a unique and energetic vibe. You'll find public parks, numerous ball fields and a community garden. Enjoy your favorite gourmet coffee from "Pear and the Pickle Cafe & Market" on Rialto Street or sip an adult beverage at "Scratch Food & Beverage" on Troy Hill's main artery of Lowrie Street. Decompress by taking in the amazing city views or take a run or a bike ride along the quite streets that link to the Three Rivers Heritage Trail and Downtown. A walking neighborhood with spectacular community events makes Troy Hill a happening place to live. This home is only steps away to all these amenities. 

Leasing Terms...

Completed residential rental application.
Subject to background and credit check.
One-year lease required.
Security deposit is due at the signing of the lease.
First months rent is due prior to move in date.

Owned and Operated by Luckey Holdings, LLC.

I look forward to hearing from you!

Tenants are responsible for Gas, Electric, Water and Sewage. Trash removal is included and service is provided by the City of Pittsburgh. Sorry, but this home is non-smoking.Read less

Description: Hobart Court is a no-brainer if you're looking for a comfortable apartment in an ideal location. The building has attractive curb appeal with well-kept landscaping and outdoor space in the courtyard. It holds one and two bedroom units with a handful of different floor plans to choose from. Most units have up-to-date kitchens and bathrooms, large living areas, as well as considerably bright windows. Some units feature original fireplaces, wood-inspired flooring, and ample closet space. Hobart Court has all the makings of a cozy apartment, and the location is the cherry on top! Only five minutes from the campuses of PITT and CMU, just down the road from Schenley Park, and within walking distance to Squirrel Hill's main strip, Murray Ave, you can easily walk to the grocery store, take a stroll to grab a cup of coffee, or to pick up that take-out you've been craving. Plus, there is a Healthy Ride Bike Station nearby and Hobart Court is a stop on Walnut Capital's resident shuttle route that goes around Pittsburgh's East End! You're a student? Lucky you! There are stops at CMU and PITT.

Description:
Nice 1-Bed apartment FOR RENT in Bellevue, PA! 
 - This LARGE 1-Bedroom/1-Bath apartment (#35) will be available for rent in Bellevue, PA on June 1st! 

This spacious (765 square feet) 1 Bed/1Bath ground floor apartment offers off-street parking, a high-efficiency furnace, dishwasher, microwave, stove, and refrigerator. This property also includes 24-hour debit/credit card-read washers and dryers on-site, a gym, and a game room with darts and a pool table. Close and easy drive to Pittsburgh (10 minutes - even in traffic) and great local shopping, pizza...and more shopping! Close to Kuhn's, Allegheny Hospital, and public transportation. 

Northgate school district. 

Water, sewage, trash, quality maintenance response time, off-street parking, and an online tenant portal are INCLUDED in the rent! $800 per month. Tenants are required to put gas and electricity in their name and supply renters insurance prior to move in or pay a $25 per month non-compliance fee.

Have a small dog or cat? We love pets - all we need is a refundable pet security deposit of $300 and an additional $55 per month pet rent.

$45 application fee per adult for criminal and credit checks. If your application is approved there is a one-time $50 administration fee.

Mention 624 West #35 when you call. This apartment DOES NOT qualify for Section 8.

Call Rich with any questions that you have and schedule a good day/time to take a look at this great apartment.

About KAUFMANNS GRAND ON FIFTH
Kaufmann's Grand on Fifth offers the most stylish and historic living in the heart of downtown Pittsburgh. Located in the iconic Kaufmann building, Kaufmann's Grand on Fifth mixes the beauties of the past with the luxuries of today. Studio, one and two-bedroom apartments are beautifully appointed with contemporary finishes and features including over-sized windows, open kitchens and stainless steel appliances. Amongst the sought-after central locale, this re-development under the clock offers convenient access to entertainment and nightlife all throughout the "Golden Triangle" in Pittsburgh.

Description:
Welcome to 2114 Perrysville! This large, private, 5 bed 2 bath home features spacious living areas and a generous kitchen with wood flooring through most of the property! The large living room has a decorative brick fireplace, arched doorway, and a full wall of windows for plenty of natural light! The dining room features a decorate light features and connects the living room and kitchen. The tile-floored kitchen has plenty of space with a decorative mosaic tile backsplash that runs the length of the counter and includes a fridge and stove. One full bath has a tiled floor, toilet, vanity with mirror, and oversized shower. The other full bath also features mosaic tile flooring and a tiled-walled shower/tub combo, toilet, and vanity with mirror. All five bedrooms are located on the upper floors. This property also has a private back yard area and walkway along the side of the building.

Located in the Deutschtown/East Allegheny area, this home is part of the Pittsburgh Public School district. Living at 2114 Perrysville affords all the peace and quiet of a residential neighborhood with quick access to all of the shopping, dining, and entertainment in North Side and Downtown including Heinz Field, PNC Park, PPG Paints Arena, Stage AE, Southern Tier Brewery, Burgatory, Allegheny Commons Park, and the National Aviary! You'll also enjoy quick access to major highways including 65, 279, 19, 28, and 376 that can take you to any nearby neighborhood including the Cultural District, Strip District, Downtown Pittsburgh, Fineview, Marshall-Shadeland, Duquesne Heights, Lawrencville, and Troy Hill!

$0 SECURITY DEPOSIT with SayRhino policy
 First month's rent due at lease signing. Tenant pays all utilities. Available for move-in 4/1/21! Pets are considered on a case-by-case basis with a fee/deposit. More information available about SayRhino at sayrhino.com. This property is professionally managed and brought to you by EBG Properties. 

*More photos coming soon*
*All information deemed reliable but not guaranteed*Read less

Description: On the water yet in the heart of Pittsburgh\u0027s historic Strip District, there\u0027s no place quite like The Cork Factory. Finally, an address that\u0027s as interesting as you are. Originally constructed in 1901 as the Armstrong Cork Factory, this landmark structure has been artfully converted into 297 Loft Apartments in the heart of Pittsburgh\u0027s popular Strip District. The nightlife, the shopping, the history, the recreation --it\u0027s yours for the taking. Wake up to a breathtaking view of the Pittsburgh skyline right outside your window. Make a latte run up the block or, better yet, brew it at home and sip it poolside or at river\u0027s edge. You can check the morning news online in the Courtyard Garden with our wireless internet access. Your day is just beginning and there\u0027s no telling where it will take you. We look forward to you making your new home at the address and location that will impress your friends, and the comfort and ease of living that will impress you! 14 ft. Exposed Ceilings, 8 ft. Windows*, Cement floors, Coffee Bar, Concrete Floors, Exposed Brick, Guest Suites, High Speed Internet Available, Historic Landmark Building, Hot Tub, Marina just steps away, Minutes to Downtown Pittsburgh & Area Highways, Near to Pittsburgh's Nightlife, Restaurants & Shopping, On Leash Dog Park, Pittsburgh Skyline View, Pool Table, River View Barbecuing, Weekly Happy Hour

Description: A distinct Pittsburgh landmark, constructed in 1921 in the midst of the downtown skyline and the Monongahela River, Terminal 21 originated as a focal point where produce and livestock met rail and industrial industries. The decades have seen this freight terminal and warehouse shift in focus to residential living, and its industrial form has long resonated with visitors and residents.Originally put to a different, industrial use, but now re-purposed to meet the current needs of a constantly evolving city, Terminal 21 fits with Pittsburghs culture of reinvention. Industry was once the heart that drove the energy of the city. Now, the emerging technological economy means room for growth within the community and for the professionals who live in it.With a comfortable modern feel inspired by the sites local heritage and history, Terminal 21 allows you to make the most of urban living. Centrally located, and primed for easy access to attractions and events throughout the city, Terminal 21 is still the center of a vibrant community and a welcoming stop on lifes journey.

Description:
Bloomfield - 2BR Apartment With Parking and Heat Included - Our Bloomfield apartments for rent in Pittsburgh are located in one of the most traditional locations in Pittsburgh. Our rentals are between Shadyside and Friendship and allow residents to enjoy all their pleasantries without going too far. Bloomfield is extremely lively with many taverns, pubs, shopping and great Italian restaurants. These once single family Victorian mansions now accommodate apartments while keeping much of their traditional style. Furthermore, the apartments for rent are close to UPMC Children's Hospital, West Penn Hospital and Pittsburgh Institute for Mortuary Science (PIMS) and other colleges and universities of Pittsburgh (Carnegie Mellon University [CMU], Duquesne University, Pittsburgh University, Carlow University, Chatham University).

Description: Holiday Park is well-planned, self contained community that\u0027s an integral part of the Pittsburgh area. Within minutes of Holiday Park you will find excellent schools, public transportation, shopping, medical offices, recreation, sports programs, day care facilities and fitness facilities. Located off of Route 286 to Business 22 you will find it convenient to the Pennsylvania Turnpike, the Parkway East, Pittsburgh, Greensburg, Oakland, Shadyside and Squirrel Hill. Enjoy a night out at the Waterfront or South side. Close to the Monroeville Mall you will find great shopping, entertainment and wonderful restaurants. A few of the many highlights of our townhomes include patios, garages, and the conveniences of in house laundry rooms, many include full size washers and dryers. Some of the apartment homes have private balconies for you to relax and enjoy your leisure moments. We also have laundry facilities and off street parking. The two and three bedroom luxury townhomes, nestled in an elegant setting, offer 2.5 baths, eat-in kitchens, dining rooms, garage, balcony and a fireplace. Holiday Park Apartments and Townhomes, we are always there for you. Take advantage of our gift to you when you make your home with us. (All new one year leases include one year membership to YMCA.) Kaufmann's Grand on Fifth offers the most stylish and historic living in the heart of downtown Pittsburgh. Located in the iconic Kaufmann building, Kaufmann's Grand on Fifth mixes the beauties of the past with the luxuries of today. Studio, one and two-bedroom apartments are beautifully appointed with contemporary finishes and features including over-sized windows, open kitchens and stainless steel appliances. Description: Holiday Park is well-planned, self contained community that\u0027s an integral part of the Pittsburgh area. Within minutes of Holiday Park you will find excellent schools, public transportation, shopping, medical offices, recreation, sports programs, day care facilities and fitness facilities. Located off of Route 286 to Business 22 you will find it convenient to the Pennsylvania Turnpike, the Parkway East, Pittsburgh, Greensburg, Oakland, Shadyside and Squirrel Hill. Enjoy a night out at the Waterfront or South side. Close to the Monroeville Mall you will find great shopping, entertainment and wonderful restaurants. A few of the many highlights of our townhomes include patios, garages, and the conveniences of in house laundry rooms, many include full size washers and dryers. Some of the apartment homes have private balconies for you to relax and enjoy your leisure moments. We also have laundry facilities and off street parking. The two and three bedroom luxury townhomes, nestled in an elegant setting, offer 2.5 baths, eat-in kitchens, dining rooms, garage, balcony and a fireplace. Holiday Park Apartments and Townhomes, we are always there for you. Take advantage of our gift to you when you make your home with us. (All new one year leases include one year membership to YMCA.) You\u0027ll appreciate the Property Concierge Advantage with dedicated and attentive staff, available 24 hours daily. On-site service personnel assures that your living experience at Holiday Park Apartments and Townhomes is enjoyable and carefree. 24 Hour Emergency Maintenance, Balconies and Patios in Select Homes, Close to PA Turnpike and Parkway East, Employer Discounts, Finished Basements - Select Homes, Located near Plum, Monroeville & Murrysville, One & Two Car Garages *Select Units, Pet Friendly (Restrictions Apply), Some with Gas Fireplace, Some with Vaulted Ceilings and Skylights, Storage Available in Select Homes, Upgraded Kitchens, Washer/Dryer Included in Select Homes

Description: Welcome to your new home at Maiden Bridge & Canongate Apartments. We offer a host of amenities to make your life easy, starting with our on-site management team ready to assist with anything you may need. Description: Built in 1928 as a hotel originally and remodeled into apartments mid-century, the building has 7 stories, 1 passenger elevator, 1 freight elevator, 2 stairwells. Description: The Howe and Maryland Apartments feature delightful one and two bedroom units with true character. Exposed brick adds warmth, while large windows provide a bright, welcome atmosphere. Close to nearby hospitals such as UPMS Shadyside and West Penn, these apartments are perfect for any medical professionals. Graduate students enjoy living here as well, with Chatham and University of Pittsburgh right down the street. Description: Experience the difference. Experience The Alden South Hills. The community is under new ownership and new management with a whole new look. Our newly renovated apartment homes offer comfort, style and convenience. The open floor plans are perfect for entertaining. Your new modern appliances and designer kitchens will be the envy of your friends. Our renovations do not just end with the apartment. Not only will you love to show off your new home, but The Alden is the only community in Pittsburgh to have a stunning NEW 15,000 square foot clubhouse with resident business center and conference room, clubroom for lounging around and a private terrace that overlooks the pool. All of our valued residents will be able to relax poolside with a shimmering pool and sun deck. A great place to escape on a hot day. You will be able to stay fit in our state of the art fitness center! We love pets and we\u0027re the perfect place for you and your four legged friends. Located on 56 park like acres, you have tons of space to take your dog for a walk. The community has two convenient playgrounds, a basketball court with multiple grilling and picnic areas. Your South Hills location is a commuter\u0027s dream. You are just a 5 minute drive to the Library Street T station, just minutes from downtown Pittsburgh, I-376, I-79 and I-51 and multiple bus stops are located throughout the community. Experience a whole new lifestyle! 24 Hour Emergency Maintenance, Baldwin-Whitehall School District, Breakfast Bars Available, Community and Private Garages Available, Convenient to Shopping and Restaurants, Cozy Resident Lounge with Business Center and Meeting Room, Decorative Ceiling Fans, Designer Kitchens in Select Apartments, Fixed Water Rates, Granite Like Counter Tops with New Lighting, High-speed Internet, Individual Climate Control, Laundry Care Center in Every Building, Microwave (Select Units), New Clubhouse and Fitness Center Now Open!!!, New Kitchens Available, One, Two and Three Bedroom Units Available, Online Maintenance Requests, Online Payments and Credit Cards Accepted, Online Rent Payment and Resident Portal, Other, Pet friendly, Pets Welcome ( Weight limit for Apts & Townhomes: Breed Restrictions Apply), Picnic Areas with Grilling Stations, Public Transportation On-Site, Relaxing Sundeck with FREE WiFi, Renovated Bathrooms with a Pedastal Sink, Renovated Kitchens with Full Size Black Appliances, Shimmering Outdoor Pool, Spacious Floor Plans, Two Fantastic Playgrounds, Under New Management and Ownership, Wall to Wall Carpet, Washer/Dryers in Select Apartments

Description: Located atop Pittsburgh's most famous vantage point, this revitalized Historic Landmark is the neighborhood's first contemporary loft-style apartments. Boasting 67 units of modern, urban living - studio, 1-Bedroom, 2-Bedroom, 3-Bedroom, and 1-2-Bedroom Townhouse units housed in the former Prospect School (1931), an Art Deco-style building listed on the National Register of Historic Places. It is within walking distance of both the Grandview Avenue and Shiloh Street commercial districts as well as Emerald View Park, which has miles of hiking trails featuring panoramic views of the city. Residents will have an easy, visually-inspiring, commute to downtown via the Monongahela Incline or by car via the PJ McArdle Roadway. Tenants pay an additional fee's for parking($45.00/month) and water ($45.00/month). Our Pet Fee is a non-refundable $250 upon move in, then $25/month per pet.12 months

Description: Shadyside Commons offers newly renovated 1- and 2- bedroom apartments that combine a contemporary living space with a peaceful environment in the coveted Shadyside neighborhood of Pittsburgh. Built in 1903, the building was constructed as a hardware store for Pittsburgh businessman John Bindle and, over a century later, the 4-story brick building still flaunts its unusually sharp style and quality details. Large brick arches, handsome cornices and oversized industrial windows couple with proximity to downtown Pittsburgh to create your perfect luxury residence. Apartments include modern kitchens and baths, ample closet space with adjustable shelving and custom storage, and in-suite washers \u0026 dryers. Located near the University of Pittsburgh, UPMC-Shadyside, and Carnegie Mellon, Shadyside Commons offers easy access to the city\u0027s parks, shopping, and restaurants, in the vibrant, yet cozy residential neighborhood of Shadyside. Ample Closet Space with Custom Shelving, Central Air Conditioning, Extra Storage, High Ceilings, High Ceilings with Large Windows, Historic Building, Large Closets, Smoke Free Community, USB Ports

Description:
Gorgeous furnished one bedroom apartment on Grandview Avenue at Maple Terrace. This first floor apartment features a comfortable and convenient urban living experience with a spectacular view of the city. Kitchen/dining, living, and sleeping rooms have large windows and high ceilings. Spacious equipped kitchen with ceramic tile floor, bay window dining area, and direct access to a private outdoor side terrace via private entry. Living/dining room has oak hardwood flooring; resilient plank flooring in the bedroom. Amenities include fireplace, off-street parking, shared laundry, central A/C and secure storage. Excellent location on Grandview Avenue just ONE block from the following amenities: Monongahela Incline, Shiloh Street business district & Shop'n'save, Post Office, CoGo's, Microdiner, Grandview Bakery RiteAid, PA Wines & Spirits, 1st Niagara & PNC Bank, Carnegie Library, etc., as well as other eating & drinking establishments. Downtown Pittsburgh is just over the Smithfield St. bridge at the bottom of the incline. Very central and convenient. No pets. Fully furnished. $1,600 per month plus gas and electric.

1 year lease term. Fully furnished. Owner pays for water & sewer; tenant pays for gas, electric and any cable TV/internet access.Read less

Description: Holiday Park is well-planned, self contained community that\u0027s an integral part of the Pittsburgh area. Within minutes of Holiday Park you will find excellent schools, public transportation, shopping, medical offices, recreation, sports programs, day care facilities and fitness facilities. Located off of Route 286 to Business 22 you will find it convenient to the Pennsylvania Turnpike, the Parkway East, Pittsburgh, Greensburg, Oakland, Shadyside and Squirrel Hill. Enjoy a night out at the Waterfront or South side. Close to the Monroeville Mall you will find great shopping, entertainment and wonderful restaurants. A few of the many highlights of our townhomes include patios, garages, and the conveniences of in house laundry rooms, many include full size washers and dryers. Some of the apartment homes have private balconies for you to relax and enjoy your leisure moments. We also have laundry facilities and off street parking. The two and three bedroom luxury townhomes, nestled in an elegant setting, offer 2.5 baths, eat-in kitchens, dining rooms, garage, balcony and a fireplace. Description: A distinct Pittsburgh landmark, constructed in 1921 in the midst of the downtown skyline and the Monongahela River, Terminal 21 originated as a focal point where produce and livestock met rail and industrial industries. The decades have seen this freight terminal and warehouse shift in focus to residential living, and its industrial form has long resonated with visitors and residents.Originally put to a different, industrial use, but now re-purposed to meet the current needs of a constantly evolving city, Terminal 21 fits with Pittsburghs culture of reinvention. Industry was once the heart that drove the energy of the city. Now, the emerging technological economy means room for growth within the community and for the professionals who live in it.With a comfortable modern feel inspired by the sites local heritage and history, Terminal 21 allows you to make the most of urban living. Centrally located, and primed for easy access to attractions and events throughout the city, Terminal 21 is still the center of a vibrant community and a welcoming stop on lifes journey.

Description:
This spacious 2 bedroom/1 bathroom apartment in Greenfield (Pittsburgh) is a perfect space for young professionals or graduate students. This apartment comprises the 2nd and 3rd floors of this completely renovated duplex, located on Hazelwood Avenue. The other apartment of the duplex has a separate entrance. 

The building is located minutes from Squirrel Hill, the Southside, Oakland, and the Waterfront shopping mall. It is only a few blocks from a main bus stop for bus lines that lead directly to Squirrel Hill, the CMU and PITT campuses in Oakland, downtown, and to the Waterfront.

The apartment has a living room, a full bathroom, 2 bedrooms, and a laundry room with a washer and dryer. The newly-updated kitchen is equipped with stainless appliances (gas range, microwave, dishwasher, refrigerator with icemaker, and disposal). The apartment also features central AC and central/forced heating for increased comfort during the summer and winter months. 

Two tandem parking spaces are located behind the duplex for the tenant's use. On-street parking is also available.

The tenant is responsible for $1,300 for rent, $35 per person for water/sewage, and electric and gas utilities based on use each month. There is a security deposit of $1,500 due to availability of the newer appliances in the home. 

The space is available in May 2021 for 1 year lease or longer. 
If interested, please respond to this ad with your email address and available days/times to view the space. There is a $32 application fee.

Space is available for move-in May 2021. Tenant is responsible for gas, electric, and $35 per person for water & sewage. Description: Holiday Park is well-planned, self contained community that\u0027s an integral part of the Pittsburgh area. Within minutes of Holiday Park you will find excellent schools, public transportation, shopping, medical offices, recreation, sports programs, day care facilities and fitness facilities. Located off of Route 286 to Business 22 you will find it convenient to the Pennsylvania Turnpike, the Parkway East, Pittsburgh, Greensburg, Oakland, Shadyside and Squirrel Hill. Enjoy a night out at the Waterfront or South side. Close to the Monroeville Mall you will find great shopping, entertainment and wonderful restaurants. A few of the many highlights of our townhomes include patios, garages, and the conveniences of in house laundry rooms, many include full size washers and dryers. Some of the apartment homes have private balconies for you to relax and enjoy your leisure moments. We also have laundry facilities and off street parking. The two and three bedroom luxury townhomes, nestled in an elegant setting, offer 2.5 baths, eat-in kitchens, dining rooms, garage, balcony and a fireplace. Holiday Park Apartments and Townhomes, we are always there for you. Take advantage of our gift to you when you make your home with us. (All new one year leases include one year membership to YMCA.) You\u0027ll appreciate the Property Concierge Advantage with dedicated and attentive staff, available 24 hours daily. On-site service personnel assures that your living experience at Holiday Park Apartments and Townhomes is enjoyable and carefree. 24 Hour Emergency Maintenance, Balconies and Patios in Select Homes, Close to PA Turnpike and Parkway East, Employer Discounts, Finished Basements - Select Homes, Located near Plum, Monroeville & Murrysville, One & Two Car Garages *Select Units, Pet Friendly (Restrictions Apply), Some with Gas Fireplace, Some with Vaulted Ceilings and Skylights, Storage Available in Select Homes, Upgraded Kitchens, Washer/Dryer Included in Select Homes

Description: Welcome to your new home at Maiden Bridge & Canongate Apartments. We offer a host of amenities to make your life easy, starting with our on-site management team ready to assist with anything you may need. Conveniently located in the South Hills, we are close to shopping, dining, and parks. Choose from our numerous studio, one-, two-, and three-bedroom floor plans with laundry facilities on every floor, fitness center, swimming pool, bike storage, and more. Apartments offer eat-in kitchen, dishwasher, and air conditioning, and utilities are included in the rent. Description: The Brix at 26, a Hudson Property, ties historic architecture and modern, upscale boutique living, while offering residents immediate access to the luxuries of the Southside Works area of Pittsburgh. Originally constructed in 1908 for Pittsburgh Mercantile Company and renovated into a beautiful apartment community in 2013, The Brix at 26 preserves the history of the building in a modern and progressive way. Residents indulge in casual sophistication while enjoying everything this beautiful and exciting area has to offer! The Brix at 26 is ideally located within the Southside Works area and is within walking distance to the riverfront trail and many of the best restaurants and nightlife that the Southside has to offer. \n\nWoof Woof, Meow Meow! We love your furry, four-legged friends and are happy to welcome your dog(s) and cat(s) ! Attached garage w/assigned parking, Controlled building access, Custom Closets, Fiber optic Internet/Cable, Green, sustainable community, Historic landmark with modern design, Intercom/Callbox for Residents, Minutes away from Carnegie Mellon University, Minutes away from downtown Pittsburgh, Minutes away from University of Pittsburgh, Outdoor Grilling Stations/Fire Pit, Oversized Floor to Ceiling Windows, Pet Friendly, Planned Social Activities, Resident/Guest Boutique Hotel Style Lobby, Rooftop Sundeck/Courtyard, Smoke-free community, Soaring 9 ft. to 18 ft. ceilings, Studios to Penthouses, V-Suites Furnished Rentals, Washer/dryer in every apartment home

Description: Welcome Home to Morgan at North ShoreMorgan at North Shore apartments are nestled along the Allegheny River across from Downtown Pittsburgh, PA. Live less than 1 mile from Heinz Field and PNC Park. Our apartments offer residents the suburban apartment feel in a private urban setting. Inside our one and two-bedroom apartments, you will find wood-style plank flooring, oversized closets & storage, washer & dryer, kitchen with pantry, and a private patio or balcony. We also have a two-bedroom with a den, perfect for a home office or extra room for quests! Residents come home to a clubhouse with resident lounge, resort-style heated pool, fitness center, grilling station, multiple green-space areas, and business center. Residents also have direct access to the Three Rivers Heritage Trail. Our Pittsburgh apartments are located in a fantastic location and offer everything you need to feel right at home!

Description: Experience the difference. Experience The Alden South Hills. The community is under new ownership and new management with a whole new look. Our newly renovated apartment homes offer comfort, style and convenience. The open floor plans are perfect for entertaining. Your new modern appliances and designer kitchens will be the envy of your friends. Our renovations do not just end with the apartment. Not only will you love to show off your new home, but The Alden is the only community in Pittsburgh to have a stunning NEW 15,000 square foot clubhouse with resident business center and conference room, clubroom for lounging around and a private terrace that overlooks the pool. All of our valued residents will be able to relax poolside with a shimmering pool and sun deck. A great place to escape on a hot day. You will be able to stay fit in our state of the art fitness center! We love pets and we\u0027re the perfect place for you and your four legged friends. Located on 56 park like acres, you have tons of space to take your dog for a walk. The community has two convenient playgrounds, a basketball court with multiple grilling and picnic areas. Your South Hills location is a commuter\u0027s dream. You are just a 5 minute drive to the Library Street T station, just minutes from downtown Pittsburgh, I-376, I-79 and I-51 and multiple bus stops are located throughout the community. Experience a whole new lifestyle! 24 Hour Emergency Maintenance, Baldwin-Whitehall School District, Breakfast Bars Available, Community and Private Garages Available, Convenient to Shopping and Restaurants, Cozy Resident Lounge with Business Center and Meeting Room, Decorative Ceiling Fans, Designer Kitchens in Select Apartments, Fixed Water Rates, Granite Like Counter Tops with New Lighting, High-speed Internet, Individual Climate Control, Laundry Care Center in Every Building, Microwave (Select Units), New Clubhouse and Fitness Center Now Open!!!, New Kitchens Available, One, Two and Three Bedroom Units Available, Online Maintenance Requests, Online Payments and Credit Cards Accepted, Online Rent Payment and Resident Portal, Other, Pet friendly, Pets Welcome ( Weight limit for Apts & Townhomes: Breed Restrictions Apply), Picnic Areas with Grilling Stations, Public Transportation On-Site, Relaxing Sundeck with FREE WiFi, Renovated Bathrooms with a Pedastal Sink, Renovated Kitchens with Full Size Black Appliances, Shimmering Outdoor Pool, Spacious Floor Plans, Two Fantastic Playgrounds, Under New Management and Ownership, Wall to Wall Carpet, Washer/Dryers in Select Apartments

Description:
This second floor apartment features hardwood floors, decorative fireplace, ceiling fans, large windows, and plenty of closet space. The ceramic kitchen has a dishwasher, built in microwave, full refrigerator, and electric stove. 
Landlord pays water, sewage, gas for the hot water, and trash disposal. Tenant pays electric only. There is electric baseboard heat and a window AC unit will be installed upon request. 
This recently renovated Point Breeze 4 unit is located 2 blocks from Mellon Park and Bakery Square. It features off street parking and a yard behind the building & coin operated laundry and storage in the basement.

All of our properties are pet friendly for friendly pets with a two pet maximum. We require proof of vaccinations and licenses, but we do not charge additional rent or fees for pets.Read less

Description: Holiday Park is well-planned, self contained community that\u0027s an integral part of the Pittsburgh area. Within minutes of Holiday Park you will find excellent schools, public transportation, shopping, medical offices, recreation, sports programs, day care facilities and fitness facilities. Located off of Route 286 to Business 22 you will find it convenient to the Pennsylvania Turnpike, the Parkway East, Pittsburgh, Greensburg, Oakland, Shadyside and Squirrel Hill. Enjoy a night out at the Waterfront or South side. Close to the Monroeville Mall you will find great shopping, entertainment and wonderful restaurants. A few of the many highlights of our townhomes include patios, garages, and the conveniences of in house laundry rooms, many include full size washers and dryers. Some of the apartment homes have private balconies for you to relax and enjoy your leisure moments. We also have laundry facilities and off street parking. The two and three bedroom luxury townhomes, nestled in an elegant setting, offer 2.5 baths, eat-in kitchens, dining rooms, garage, balcony and a fireplace. Holiday Park Apartments and Townhomes, we are always there for you. Take advantage of our gift to you when you make your home with us. (All new one year leases include one year membership to YMCA.) You\u0027ll appreciate the Property Concierge Advantage with dedicated and attentive staff, available 24 hours daily. On-site service personnel assures that your living experience at Holiday Park Apartments and Townhomes is enjoyable and carefree. 24 Hour Emergency Maintenance, Balconies and Patios in Select Homes, Close to PA Turnpike and Parkway East, Employer Discounts, Finished Basements - Select Homes, Located near Plum, Monroeville & Murrysville, One & Two Car Garages *Select Units, Pet Friendly (Restrictions Apply), Some with Gas Fireplace, Some with Vaulted Ceilings and Skylights, Storage Available in Select Homes, Upgraded Kitchens, Washer/Dryer Included in Select Homes

Description:
This beautiful apartment is located on a quiet residential street in the much desired Point Breeze neighborhood. Apartment is the entire second floor of a spacious duplex that contains a large living/dining space in addition to two large bedrooms with tons of natural light. Duplex also features a captive room that can be used however you might like-- as a den, an office, or even a third bedroom. Entertain your guests on the large covered front porch. AC window units are available for every room. Laundry is located in the basement. Occasional off-street parking. Small dogs (under 20 lbs) will be considered. One cat okay. Located within blocks of several bus lines, within walking distance to Bakery Square, and just two short blocks to Frick Park. You can't beat this amazing location! Pictures reflect both when apartment was lived in and now freshly painted and move-in ready. Schedule to see this apartment TODAY!

Description:
This is a gorgeous well-maintained 3-bedroom unit on the first floor conveniently located in North Oakland/Shadyside with a great walk score 86. This unit comes with one modern bathroom, all hardwood-like floors, and a fully-equipped kitchen. The modern kitchen has a large stainless-steel double door fridge (with cool water dispenser), a dishwasher, a range, a range-top microwave oven, and a marble countertop. The modern bathroom is equipped with an updated bathtub. exhaust fan, and ceramic tiles walls and floors, updated faucets, toilets, etc. This unit also is equipped with a central air conditioning system for your convenience in the hot summer time. Moreover, the house is well insulated to save energy (means lower heating gas costs in the winter). Another advantage of this unit is its direct access to the laundry center in the basement through a locked door.

For your convenience, the unit has on-site coin-operated laundry center in the basement and a full bathroom. For your security, the unit has motion-sensor outdoor lights and surveillance cameras. What's more, the private fenced backyard is ideal for summer BBQ. Also, the basement has a spacious storage area with a new dry concrete floor. 

What's more, this unit has a large concrete backyard for BBQ and a large concrete parking space (for 4 cars). Off-street parking is $50/month/car. A bike shlter is conventienly available in the front of the house.

To provide better security, the property has motion sensor lights and 7x24 surveillance cameras.

This unit is conveniently located in the North Oakland/Shadyside area. Just about 5 minutes walk to PNC Bank, Einstein Bros breakfast or many restaurants (Chinese, Chipotle, KFC, Pizza, Qdoba, Penn subs, etc.) and a 24-hour convenience store (GetGo) with hot food kitchen. The main bus line is right at the corner that takes you to Oakland (Pitt/CMU campuses and UPMC hospitals) and downtown. Moreover, Pitt/CMU campus, food court, grocery stores are all in the walking distance. Pitt/CMU shuttle stop is just one block away.

This property is managed and owned by the General Realty Management, Ltd with a reliable dedicate team for maintenance and management for 12+ years in the Pittsburgh area.
Terms:
- Application fee: $35/person
- Off-street parking: $50/month/car

In addition to the rent, Tenants pay water/sewer $35/person/month, plus gas and electricity. Application fee: $35/person.Read less

Description: Welcome to the Cosmopolitan Apartments! Our brand new apartment community offers modern living at it's finest in a location that is equally as impressive.Treat yourself to convenient, upscale living in an apartment community like no other at the Cosmopolitan Apartments in Ross Township, just outside Pittsburgh, PA. Large open floor plans with one and two-bedroom options are the perfect complement to your modern lifestyle. Gourmet kitchens complete with quartz countertops, a full range of stainless steel appliances, and a breakfast bar brighten your day, while the private patio or balcony creates a unique outdoor space all your own.Our new community is located in the charming North Hills neighborhood, close to I-279 for a quick commute to downtown Pittsburgh. We are also situated in the highly rated North Hills School District. As a resident, you will enjoy a luxury package of community amenities full of health-boosting and high-tech benefits to enhance your lifestyle. De-stress with a great read on our rooftop terrace and sundeck.
