Description: Holiday Park is well-planned, self contained community that\u0027s an integral part of the Pittsburgh area. Within minutes of Holiday Park you will find excellent schools, public transportation, shopping, medical offices, recreation, sports programs, day care facilities and fitness facilities. Located off of Route 286 to Business 22 you will find it convenient to the Pennsylvania Turnpike, the Parkway East, Pittsburgh, Greensburg, Oakland, Shadyside and Squirrel Hill. Enjoy a night out at the Waterfront or South side. Close to the Monroeville Mall you will find great shopping, entertainment and wonderful restaurants. A few of the many highlights of our townhomes include patios, garages, and the conveniences of in house laundry rooms, many include full size washers and dryers. Some of the apartment homes have private balconies for you to relax and enjoy your leisure moments. We also have laundry facilities and off street parking. The two and three bedroom luxury townhomes, nestled in an elegant setting, offer 2.5 baths, eat-in kitchens, dining rooms, garage, balcony and a fireplace. Description:
Huge 3 bedroom, 1 bathroom newly renovated apartment located on California St. in Avalon. 1800+ sq. ft. Large living room and plenty of closet space in each room. Located on 2nd floor. Perfect for a family or roommates. Plenty of space for anyone working from home. 

I have a tenant moving out.. her lease runs through June, but she indicated she might be leaving earlier (e.g. May 30 or June 6), so lease start date is negotiable -- can be anytime in June or even July 1.

New Kitchen, Hardwood Floors, and Paint. Bedrooms equipped with ceiling fans. 

Off-street and street parking. Coin-operated laundry and storage available in basement. Water included. Gas and Electric is tenant's responsibility. 

Quick walk to shops and restaurants in Avalon and Bellevue. Kuhn's market under 1/4 Mile away. Located on #16 Bus Route to Downtown. 

E-mail to arrange a showing. CREDIT APPLICATION REQUIRED. Credit Score of 650 required. Please don't apply if you do not meet this requirement.

1-year lease. Owner pays trash, sewer, and water. Tenant responsible for gas and Electric. No smoking. Pets considered.Read less

Description: A distinct Pittsburgh landmark, constructed in 1921 in the midst of the downtown skyline and the Monongahela River, Terminal 21 originated as a focal point where produce and livestock met rail and industrial industries. The decades have seen this freight terminal and warehouse shift in focus to residential living, and its industrial form has long resonated with visitors and residents.Originally put to a different, industrial use, but now re-purposed to meet the current needs of a constantly evolving city, Terminal 21 fits with Pittsburghs culture of reinvention. Industry was once the heart that drove the energy of the city. Now, the emerging technological economy means room for growth within the community and for the professionals who live in it.With a comfortable modern feel inspired by the sites local heritage and history, Terminal 21 allows you to make the most of urban living. Centrally located, and primed for easy access to attractions and events throughout the city, Terminal 21 is still the center of a vibrant community and a welcoming stop on lifes journey.

Description: Quiet elegance, luxury living, and a satisfying atmosphere are yours at Westpointe Apartment  Homes in Pittsburgh, PA. At Westpointe you\u0027ll find comfort, solitude, and convenience. Westpointe\u0027s beautifully appointed apartments feature walk-in closets, ceiling fans, and a dishwasher, plus we are pet friendly. You\u0027ll enjoy the refreshing swimming pool, tennis court, and BBQ \u0026 picnic area. Gently situated in the rolling landscape of Robinson Township, Westpointe Apartments is just 15 minutes away from downtown Pittsburgh. Westpointe offers many recreational facilities within minutes - tennis, golf, skiing, skating, horseback riding, and vast picnic grounds are never more than a short drive away. There\u0027s also easy access to schools and public transportation. Description: Holiday Park is well-planned, self contained community that\u0027s an integral part of the Pittsburgh area. Within minutes of Holiday Park you will find excellent schools, public transportation, shopping, medical offices, recreation, sports programs, day care facilities and fitness facilities. Located off of Route 286 to Business 22 you will find it convenient to the Pennsylvania Turnpike, the Parkway East, Pittsburgh, Greensburg, Oakland, Shadyside and Squirrel Hill. Enjoy a night out at the Waterfront or South side. Close to the Monroeville Mall you will find great shopping, entertainment and wonderful restaurants. A few of the many highlights of our townhomes include patios, garages, and the conveniences of in house laundry rooms, many include full size washers and dryers. Some of the apartment homes have private balconies for you to relax and enjoy your leisure moments. We also have laundry facilities and off street parking. The two and three bedroom luxury townhomes, nestled in an elegant setting, offer 2.5 baths, eat-in kitchens, dining rooms, garage, balcony and a fireplace. Holiday Park Apartments and Townhomes, we are always there for you. Take advantage of our gift to you when you make your home with us. (All new one year leases include one year membership to YMCA.) You\u0027ll appreciate the Property Concierge Advantage with dedicated and attentive staff, available 24 hours daily. On-site service personnel assures that your living experience at Holiday Park Apartments and Townhomes is enjoyable and carefree. 24 Hour Emergency Maintenance, Balconies and Patios in Select Homes, Close to PA Turnpike and Parkway East, Employer Discounts, Finished Basements - Select Homes, Located near Plum, Monroeville & Murrysville, One & Two Car Garages *Select Units, Pet Friendly (Restrictions Apply), Some with Gas Fireplace, Some with Vaulted Ceilings and Skylights, Storage Available in Select Homes, Upgraded Kitchens, Washer/Dryer Included in Select Homes

Description: A distinct Pittsburgh landmark, constructed in 1921 in the midst of the downtown skyline and the Monongahela River, Terminal 21 originated as a focal point where produce and livestock met rail and industrial industries. The decades have seen this freight terminal and warehouse shift in focus to residential living, and its industrial form has long resonated with visitors and residents.Originally put to a different, industrial use, but now re-purposed to meet the current needs of a constantly evolving city, Terminal 21 fits with Pittsburghs culture of reinvention. Industry was once the heart that drove the energy of the city. Now, the emerging technological economy means room for growth within the community and for the professionals who live in it.With a comfortable modern feel inspired by the sites local heritage and history, Terminal 21 allows you to make the most of urban living. Centrally located, and primed for easy access to attractions and events throughout the city, Terminal 21 is still the center of a vibrant community and a welcoming stop on lifes journey.

Description:
Centrally located 1 bedroom apartment in Squirrel Hill. 
This is a rear upstairs apartment of a three unit building one block from the Forbes Avenue business strip. You share a hallway with the apartment across the hall. The owner lives in the downstairs unit.
Your apartment has a view of the backyard trees. It has a large master bedroom with two nice closets. In the hallway between the master bedroom and bathroom is a large walk-in-closet, sometimes used as an office. The hallway also has a linen closet. The kitchen is eat-in, with a pantry and cabinets. The apartment also has a living room with a view of the backyard. Air conditioning units are included. The two upstairs apartments have a shared washer/dryer set up in the basement. Additionally the basement has auxiliary storage space. This is a no smoking, no pet apartment.
Flooring: The kitchen has linoleum tiles, the bathroom ceramic tiles. The rest of the apartment has hardwood floors. The stoop and entrance for this upstairs apartment is on the side of the house. You walk up a flight of 18 stairs to get to the apartment.
Our building was built in 1901 and has been lovingly cared for. 
$1150/month + gas and electric. $50 credit check. Requires 1 month rent and 2 month security deposit to secure the apartment. 
The square footage is approximate.
Call or text Joel.

Rent + Gas + Electric + 50 credit checkRead less

Description: On the water yet in the heart of Pittsburgh\u0027s historic Strip District, there\u0027s no place quite like The Cork Factory. Finally, an address that\u0027s as interesting as you are. Originally constructed in 1901 as the Armstrong Cork Factory, this landmark structure has been artfully converted into 297 Loft Apartments in the heart of Pittsburgh\u0027s popular Strip District. The nightlife, the shopping, the history, the recreation --it\u0027s yours for the taking. Wake up to a breathtaking view of the Pittsburgh skyline right outside your window. Make a latte run up the block or, better yet, brew it at home and sip it poolside or at river\u0027s edge. You can check the morning news online in the Courtyard Garden with our wireless internet access. Your day is just beginning and there\u0027s no telling where it will take you. We look forward to you making your new home at the address and location that will impress your friends, and the comfort and ease of living that will impress you! 14 ft. Exposed Ceilings, 8 ft. Windows*, Cement floors, Coffee Bar, Concrete Floors, Exposed Brick, Guest Suites, High Speed Internet Available, Historic Landmark Building, Hot Tub, Marina just steps away, Minutes to Downtown Pittsburgh & Area Highways, Near to Pittsburgh's Nightlife, Restaurants & Shopping, On Leash Dog Park, Pittsburgh Skyline View, Pool Table, River View Barbecuing, Weekly Happy Hour

Description:
For August 1st, 2021 Move in.

 PLEASE NOTE - WE DO NOT ACCEPT PHONE CALLS FOR SCHEDULING APPOINTMENTS. ALL APPOINTMENTS MUST BE SCHEDULED VIA EMAIL OR THIS SITE'S FORM 

Large partially fenced side yard. On street parking. 

Stand alone house, we provide all appliances. 1st floor: living room, dining room, kitchen, half bath, laundry. 2nd floor: 2 bedrooms and 1 full bath. Recently remodeled with new: paint, kitchen, appliances, bath, flooring, furnace, etc. No carpet - all hardwood. Central A/C. Laundry conveniently located on 1st floor; washer/dryer provided. 

11 reasons why we're the best landlord:
1- Most emails responded to within 1 hour, all by end of business.
2- We have flexible showing times including weekends and evenings. 
3- No carpet to deal with
4- Vinyl windows, new efficient furnace and central a/c to save you $ on utilities
5- Brand new bathrooms & kitchen. 
6- Units are super clean upon move in.
7- We supply all new appliances (Gas range, microwave, fridge, dishwasher, washer & dryer)
8- We're real landlords and take pride in our homes and provide prompt response for maintenance. 
9- We're pet friendly and never charge additional rent or fees. ($250 fully refundable pet deposit required) 
10- All our applications and leases are online.
11- Pay your rent online - no more sending checks. 

Rental Terms: 
- Tenant pays utilities (gas, electric, water/sewage)
- Cats and Dogs Accepted ($250 pet deposit, per pet, subject to breeds - no dangerous animals) 
- Security Deposit and First Month's Rent Required
- Credit Check Required ($40 per person, non-refundable)
- Good credit and documented income required
- Not approved by section 8
- 1 year lease

Contact: 
- Email for more information and to schedule a viewing (most emails are responded to within 1 hour, all by end of day)
- We never ask prospective tenants to submit to credit checks or background checks for housing until they have met us in person and viewed the rental unit

Rent + gas, electric & water.Read less

Description:
Allegheny City Realty is pleased to present this spacious 1 bedroom / 1 bath completely renovated apartment in Troy Hill. The apartment is a quick drive to downtown Pittsburgh, the Strip District and Lawrenceville, and a short walk to Scratch restaurant, the Pear and a Pickle cafe, convenience stores and book shops.

The unit features central AC, high ceilings, and refinished original hard wood floors throughout the unit. Custom kitchen with white cabinets, brand new stainless steel appliances and washer/dryer in unit! 

The unit has maintained some of its original (19th Century) features including original hard wood floors, mantels, doors, and built-in wall cabinets in the kitchen. The units are a perfect mix of old charm with a new modern renovation and finishes. 

Parking on street only

Utilities:
Gas and electric in tenant's name
Water/sewage/trash removal covered by flat fee: 
$50 for first person + $25 for each additional person

Cats ok with extra deposit/pet rent
No Dogs- Sorry

Application includes background and credit check. Credit Requirements: Credit score of 650 or above. Under 650 will still be considered with a cosigner or an additional security deposit of up to 2 months rent. Must have no credit accounts in collections.Read less

Description: The Brix at 26, a Hudson Property, ties historic architecture and modern, upscale boutique living, while offering residents immediate access to the luxuries of the Southside Works area of Pittsburgh. Originally constructed in 1908 for Pittsburgh Mercantile Company and renovated into a beautiful apartment community in 2013, The Brix at 26 preserves the history of the building in a modern and progressive way. Residents indulge in casual sophistication while enjoying everything this beautiful and exciting area has to offer! Description: Welcome Home to Morgan at North ShoreMorgan at North Shore apartments are nestled along the Allegheny River across from Downtown Pittsburgh, PA. Live less than 1 mile from Heinz Field and PNC Park. Our apartments offer residents the suburban apartment feel in a private urban setting. Inside our one and two-bedroom apartments, you will find wood-style plank flooring, oversized closets & storage, washer & dryer, kitchen with pantry, and a private patio or balcony. We also have a two-bedroom with a den, perfect for a home office or extra room for quests! Residents come home to a clubhouse with resident lounge, resort-style heated pool, fitness center, grilling station, multiple green-space areas, and business center. Residents also have direct access to the Three Rivers Heritage Trail. Our Pittsburgh apartments are located in a fantastic location and offer everything you need to feel right at home!

Description:
You Do Not Want To Miss Out On This Opportunity!
You will love this 6-unit Victorian mansion located in the heart of Highland Park. 

Features: Hardwood Floors, Dishwasher, Built-in Microwave, Ample Amount of Closet, Recently Remodeled Bathroom, Numerous Large Windows, Private Porch. 

Amenities: Access to the Pool, Fitness Room, and Dog Run on the Main Property Located Just Across the Street! 

Location:10 min walk to Tazza D'Ora coffee shop and acclaimed restaurants on charming Bryant St. -- Only 10min drive to Wholefoods, Giant Eagle, Target, and Trader Joes! -- Catch a movie at the Waterworks Mall just 15min away. -- Less than 10min away from Lawrenceville, home of UPMC Children's Hospital and night clubs at Butler st. -- Less than 10min away from Shadyside West Penn Hospital and UPMC Shadyside Hospital

Tours available Monday- Saturday give us a call or reply to our ad.
Office Located across the street at Highland Park Club Apartments, 1001 N Negley Ave, Pittsburgh, PA

DESCRIPTION
These are fully renovated apartments with modern designs and open floor plans. Our spacious living rooms feature large windows that drench the room in sunlight. 

A laundry room is located in the basement of the building with modern front-loading card-operated machines, a sink. 

The tenant is only responsible for Electricity!

Enjoy our fitness center year-round and relax from the sun on those hot summer months in our spacious in-ground pool. Or have a BBQ with friends utilizing one of our numerous grills with free propane provided year-round on the main property located just across the street. 

WE ARE PET FRIENDLY (2 Pet Max, STRICT 25lbs Weight Limit )

APPLICATION PROCESS
There is a $30 application fee, we will be running a CREDIT and BACKGROUND check. 
Applicant must have no criminal record and have a credit score of 700 or higher. 
A Security deposit that is equal to 1 months' rent is needed to hold the apartment.

Description: A distinct Pittsburgh landmark, constructed in 1921 in the midst of the downtown skyline and the Monongahela River, Terminal 21 originated as a focal point where produce and livestock met rail and industrial industries. The decades have seen this freight terminal and warehouse shift in focus to residential living, and its industrial form has long resonated with visitors and residents.Originally put to a different, industrial use, but now re-purposed to meet the current needs of a constantly evolving city, Terminal 21 fits with Pittsburghs culture of reinvention. Industry was once the heart that drove the energy of the city. Now, the emerging technological economy means room for growth within the community and for the professionals who live in it.With a comfortable modern feel inspired by the sites local heritage and history, Terminal 21 allows you to make the most of urban living. Centrally located, and primed for easy access to attractions and events throughout the city, Terminal 21 is still the center of a vibrant community and a welcoming stop on lifes journey.

Description:
This spacious 2 bedroom/1 bathroom apartment in Greenfield (Pittsburgh) is a perfect space for young professionals or graduate students. This apartment comprises the 2nd and 3rd floors of this completely renovated duplex, located on Hazelwood Avenue. The other apartment of the duplex has a separate entrance. 

The building is located minutes from Squirrel Hill, the Southside, Oakland, and the Waterfront shopping mall. It is only a few blocks from a main bus stop for bus lines that lead directly to Squirrel Hill, the CMU and PITT campuses in Oakland, downtown, and to the Waterfront.

The apartment has a living room, a full bathroom, 2 bedrooms, and a laundry room with a washer and dryer. The newly-updated kitchen is equipped with stainless appliances (gas range, microwave, dishwasher, refrigerator with icemaker, and disposal). The apartment also features central AC and central/forced heating for increased comfort during the summer and winter months. 

Two tandem parking spaces are located behind the duplex for the tenant's use. On-street parking is also available.

The tenant is responsible for $1,300 for rent, $35 per person for water/sewage, and electric and gas utilities based on use each month. There is a security deposit of $1,500 due to availability of the newer appliances in the home. 

The space is available in May 2021 for 1 year lease or longer. 
If interested, please respond to this ad with your email address and available days/times to view the space. There is a $32 application fee.

Space is available for move-in May 2021. Tenant is responsible for gas, electric, and $35 per person for water & sewage. Trash service & lawn care are included in rental fee. $32 application fee. 1 Year minimum lease. Cats are okay! 1st month rent and $1,500 security deposit, are due to move-inRead less

Description:
SHORT TERM - Available for 2 month lease June 1st - July 31st 2021 only.
This third floor, one bedroom unit is conveniently located a block from the University of Pittsburgh, Carlow University, hospitals, and everything Oakland has to offer! Recently renovated apartment with hardwood floors, plenty of closet space, and sliding glass doors in the living room for fresh air and natural light. The ceramic kitchen has dishwasher, built in microwave, glass top stove, garbage disposal, and oak cabinets. The building offers basement storage, laundry facilities, and one off street parking spot is included in the rent. We provide a window AC and tenants pay electric only. This is a recently renovated 26 unit building, conveniently located 1 1/2 blocks away from the University of Pittsburgh, Carlow University, hospitals, and everything Oakland has to offer! 
Each unit has an assigned off street parking space included in the rent. There is coin operated laundry and extra storage in the basement. 
There are bike racks inside the building on each floor.

Description: A distinct Pittsburgh landmark, constructed in 1921 in the midst of the downtown skyline and the Monongahela River, Terminal 21 originated as a focal point where produce and livestock met rail and industrial industries. The decades have seen this freight terminal and warehouse shift in focus to residential living, and its industrial form has long resonated with visitors and residents.Originally put to a different, industrial use, but now re-purposed to meet the current needs of a constantly evolving city, Terminal 21 fits with Pittsburghs culture of reinvention. Industry was once the heart that drove the energy of the city. Now, the emerging technological economy means room for growth within the community and for the professionals who live in it.With a comfortable modern feel inspired by the sites local heritage and history, Terminal 21 allows you to make the most of urban living. Centrally located, and primed for easy access to attractions and events throughout the city, Terminal 21 is still the center of a vibrant community and a welcoming stop on lifes journey.

Description: Holiday Park is well-planned, self contained community that\u0027s an integral part of the Pittsburgh area. Within minutes of Holiday Park you will find excellent schools, public transportation, shopping, medical offices, recreation, sports programs, day care facilities and fitness facilities. Located off of Route 286 to Business 22 you will find it convenient to the Pennsylvania Turnpike, the Parkway East, Pittsburgh, Greensburg, Oakland, Shadyside and Squirrel Hill. Enjoy a night out at the Waterfront or South side. Close to the Monroeville Mall you will find great shopping, entertainment and wonderful restaurants. A few of the many highlights of our townhomes include patios, garages, and the conveniences of in house laundry rooms, many include full size washers and dryers. Some of the apartment homes have private balconies for you to relax and enjoy your leisure moments. We also have laundry facilities and off street parking. The two and three bedroom luxury townhomes, nestled in an elegant setting, offer 2.5 baths, eat-in kitchens, dining rooms, garage, balcony and a fireplace. Holiday Park Apartments and Townhomes, we are always there for you. Take advantage of our gift to you when you make your home with us. (All new one year leases include one year membership to YMCA.) You\u0027ll appreciate the Property Concierge Advantage with dedicated and attentive staff, available 24 hours daily. On-site service personnel assures that your living experience at Holiday Park Apartments and Townhomes is enjoyable and carefree. 24 Hour Emergency Maintenance, Balconies and Patios in Select Homes, Close to PA Turnpike and Parkway East, Employer Discounts, Finished Basements - Select Homes, Located near Plum, Monroeville & Murrysville, One & Two Car Garages *Select Units, Pet Friendly (Restrictions Apply), Some with Gas Fireplace, Some with Vaulted Ceilings and Skylights, Storage Available in Select Homes, Upgraded Kitchens, Washer/Dryer Included in Select Homes

Description: Originally known as the Commonwealth Trust Bank, this historic tower has been serving the people of Downtown Pittsburgh for over a hundred years. Today, the building has been reborn—with stunning, light-filled modern apartment homes and amazing amenities, all within a timeless monument right in Pittsburgh’s Fourth Avenue Historic District. Throughout the iconic tower, you’ll find some of the best amenity spaces in Pittsburgh. Come explore, and you’ll find a stunning outdoor roof terrace, a 2-story club \u0026 game room, and even a bicycle garage tucked away in the bank’s original vault. With a completely reimagined interior and unbelievable skyline and river views, The Commonwealth Building has become home to stunning boutique living spaces that combine the best of both worlds—old-world craftsmanship, with modern simplicity and style. Clubroom, Den, Library/Billiards Room, On-site Management, Package Lockers, Roofdeck with Grilling Station, Storage Lockers, Terrace

Description:
Features: Real Hardwood Floors, Dishwasher, Built-in Microwave, Huge Walk-in Closet, Deep Window Sills, Ample Amount of Windows. 

Amenities: Access to the Pool, Fitness Room and Dog Run on the Main Property Locates Just across the street! 

Location:10 min walk to Tazza D'Ora coffee shop and acclaimed restaurants on charming Bryant St. -- Only 10min drive to Wholefoods, Giant Eagle, Target, and Trader Joes! -- Catch a movie at the Waterworks Mall just 15min away. -- Less than 10min away from Lawrenceville, home of UPMC Children's Hospital and night clubs at Butler st. -- Less than 10min away from Shadyside West Penn Hospital and UPMC Shadyside Hospital

Tours available Monday- Saturday give us a call or reply to our craigslist ad.
Office Located at Highland Park Club Apartments, 1001 N Negley Ave, Pittsburgh, PA

DESCRIPTION
The one and two bedrooms are fully renovated apartments with modern designs and open floor plans, with water included. Our spacious living rooms feature large windows that drench the room in sunlight. The big eat-in kitchen is cheerful, and bright, with a built-in microwave, dishwasher, ample cabinets, and a generous amount of countertop space. You'll love the recently remodeled shower and beautiful tile work in the bathrooms. 

A laundry room is located in the basement of the building with modern front-loading machines, sink, and a folding table. 

Enjoy our fitness center year-round and relax from the sun on those hot summer months in our spacious in-ground pool. Or have a BBQ with friends utilizing our grills with free propane provided year-round on the main property located just across the street. 

WE ARE PET FRIENDLY And have a dog run located on the main property. (STRICT 25lbs limit; 2 Pet Max)

APPLICATION PROCESS
There is a $30 application fee, we will be running a CREDIT and BACKGROUND check. 
Applicants must have no criminal record and have a credit score of 700 or higher. 
A Security deposit that is equal to 1 months' rent is needed to hold the apartment.Read less

Description: Holiday Park is well-planned, self contained community that\u0027s an integral part of the Pittsburgh area. Within minutes of Holiday Park you will find excellent schools, public transportation, shopping, medical offices, recreation, sports programs, day care facilities and fitness facilities. Located off of Route 286 to Business 22 you will find it convenient to the Pennsylvania Turnpike, the Parkway East, Pittsburgh, Greensburg, Oakland, Shadyside and Squirrel Hill. Enjoy a night out at the Waterfront or South side. Close to the Monroeville Mall you will find great shopping, entertainment and wonderful restaurants. A few of the many highlights of our townhomes include patios, garages, and the conveniences of in house laundry rooms, many include full size washers and dryers. Some of the apartment homes have private balconies for you to relax and enjoy your leisure moments. We also have laundry facilities and off street parking. The two and three bedroom luxury townhomes, nestled in an elegant setting, offer 2.5 baths, eat-in kitchens, dining rooms, garage, balcony and a fireplace. Holiday Park Apartments and Townhomes, we are always there for you. Take advantage of our gift to you when you make your home with us. (All new one year leases include one year membership to YMCA.) You\u0027ll appreciate the Property Concierge Advantage with dedicated and attentive staff, available 24 hours daily. Description: A distinct Pittsburgh landmark, constructed in 1921 in the midst of the downtown skyline and the Monongahela River, Terminal 21 originated as a focal point where produce and livestock met rail and industrial industries. The decades have seen this freight terminal and warehouse shift in focus to residential living, and its industrial form has long resonated with visitors and residents.Originally put to a different, industrial use, but now re-purposed to meet the current needs of a constantly evolving city, Terminal 21 fits with Pittsburghs culture of reinvention. Industry was once the heart that drove the energy of the city. Now, the emerging technological economy means room for growth within the community and for the professionals who live in it.With a comfortable modern feel inspired by the sites local heritage and history, Terminal 21 allows you to make the most of urban living. Centrally located, and primed for easy access to attractions and events throughout the city, Terminal 21 is still the center of a vibrant community and a welcoming stop on lifes journey.

Description: Originally known as the Commonwealth Trust Bank, this historic tower has been serving the people of Downtown Pittsburgh for over a hundred years. Today, the building has been rebornwith stunning, light-filled modern apartment homes and amazing amenities, all within a timeless monument right in Pittsburghs Fourth Avenue Historic District. Throughout the iconic tower, youll find some of the best amenity spaces in Pittsburgh. Come explore, and youll find a stunning outdoor roof terrace, a 2-story club \u0026 game room, and even a bicycle garage tucked away in the banks original vault. With a completely reimagined interior and unbelievable skyline and river views, The Commonwealth Building has become home to stunning boutique living spaces that combine the best of both worldsold-world craftsmanship, with modern simplicity and style. Description:
Cozy 1 Bedroom/1 Bath Available Now! - Available: June 11th!

This cozy 1 bedroom/1 bath will feel like home in no time! Walk through the front door and you are greeted by amazing luxury vinyl planking that stretches throughout the entire apartment. An open concept kitchen, dining, and living room feature all of the amenities that you could want: new cabinets, granite countertops, built-in microwave, tons of natural sunlight, and a custom light fixture. The bathroom features modern subway tiles lining the shower, new bathroom cabinet, and tiled floors.

Come and check out today! Even better in person.

Also, enjoy our RPM resident rewards program! Our residents will receive a free Purqz account (rpmrentalrewards.com) that saves our tenants an average of $83 a month at restaurants, grocery stores, travel, etc. You'll find over 1,000 local and national merchants on the app. We also offer a free utility set-up/transfer concierge service! We'll help you get the very best prices on utilities and do all the work for you.

Terms:
- Tenant only pays Gas and Electric!
- 1 parking spot available
- Security deposit one month's rent
- Sorry, no pets.
- $55 application fee per adult for credit/criminal/eviction check
- NO SMOKING (Inside or Outside)
- $25 monthly resident management fee (PURQZ, online payments, etc.)

Background Check:

Credit
- Must have a credit score of 600 or above. Under 600 will still be considered with a cosigner and additional security deposit of up to 2 months rent. Must have no credit accounts in collections.

Income
- Must gross at least 3 times the monthly rent.

References
- We will call previous landlord and employer as well as collect pay stubs.

About us:
Pay rent, request maintenance, and contact your dedicated, professional property manager online or in person.

Real Property Management Pittsburgh strives to provide quality, safe, clean housing to tenants who want the same. We strive to improve lives and our communities by continuously elevating property management standards.

No Pets Allowed

Description:
This nicely updated 2-level apartment with off-street parking and brand new central A/C is all hardwood and tile on the main level, and carpet on the upper level. You'll have a large, updated kitchen with a dishwasher and garbage disposal. Situated on a quiet street just 1 block from the heart of Bloomfield's bustling business district, 2 blocks from Children's hospital, and walking distance to popular Lawrenceville and Shadyside. One of many bus lines will take you right into downtown, Oakland, the Southside, or just about any other Pittsburgh hot spot. Off-street parking for 2 cars (tandem) is practically unheard of in this highly desirable neighborhood. Laundry is available in the basement, which is shared with the other apartment (It is a duplex) in the building.

Owner pays for water and sewer, and trash collection via property taxes. Tenant pays gas, electric, and cable.Read less

Description:
This is a third floor apartment that has been completely remodeled. It features hardwood floors, vaulted ceilings, large windows, ceiling fans, window air conditioning units, ample closets, and an updated bathroom with ceramic tile. The ceramic kitchen is open to the living room with custom cabinets, dishwasher, glass top stove, track lighting, and room for a table. 
Landlord pays water, sewage, gas for the hot water, and trash disposal. Tenant pays electric. There is electric heat and two window AC units wil be installed upon request. 
This is a completely renovated 6 unit building in one of the most sought after neighborhoods in Pittsburgh. It is located near Aldi, Market District, the busway, Whole Foods, Shadyside Hospital, and more. There is very easy on street parking and limited parking in the back. It has limited storage in the basement, and coin operated laundry on the first floor. 

All of our properties are pet friendly for friendly pets with a two pet maximum. We require proof of vaccinations and licenses, but we do not charge additional rent or fees for pets.Read less

Description: A distinct Pittsburgh landmark, constructed in 1921 in the midst of the downtown skyline and the Monongahela River, Terminal 21 originated as a focal point where produce and livestock met rail and industrial industries. The decades have seen this freight terminal and warehouse shift in focus to residential living, and its industrial form has long resonated with visitors and residents.Originally put to a different, industrial use, but now re-purposed to meet the current needs of a constantly evolving city, Terminal 21 fits with Pittsburghs culture of reinvention. Industry was once the heart that drove the energy of the city. Now, the emerging technological economy means room for growth within the community and for the professionals who live in it.With a comfortable modern feel inspired by the sites local heritage and history, Terminal 21 allows you to make the most of urban living. Centrally located, and primed for easy access to attractions and events throughout the city, Terminal 21 is still the center of a vibrant community and a welcoming stop on lifes journey.

Description: Its cool to live hot!Hot Metal Flats is the most commuter-friendly luxury apartment building in the SouthSide Works neighborhood of Pittsburgh. Designed to LEED (Registered) Silver standards, Hot Metal Flats amenities support sustainable living and encourage your active lifestyle.A professional-grade fitness center, over-sized gathering spaces and exterior lighting displays combine to create a vibrant atmosphere. Residents can enjoy the private lounge and bar area, and the outdoor lounge with grills and a sundeck, heated for year-round use! EV charging stations, car sharing, bicycle storage and a bike repair shop on-site inspire greener living. Restaurants, shops, a movie theater, grocery store and more, as well as two hotels (HYATT House and Springhill Suites) are within walking distance.Hot Metal Flats welcomes pets* and offers a mudroom with pet wash stations and outdoor green space.Integral parking provides convenience, protection from the elements, and enhances building security.Hot Metal Flats features studio, 1-bedroom, and 2-bedroom urban-style apartments ranging from 550 square feet to 1280 square feet. Description: The Foundry at 41st is bravely setting new standards for apartment living. Come home to comfort, luxury and endless amenities. Choose from a variety of stylish studios, one or two-bedroom apartments adorned with everything you'd expect from an upscale, resort-style community. Enjoy high-end features and finishes in your unit, a considerate amount of amenities, and contemporary decor designed around Pittsburgh's steel industry and the history of the former foundry located at the apartment building's site.Join us and embrace the mixture of history and modernity in a community that entwines Lawrenceville's industrial roots and evokes a trendy, urban vibe. From the secured parking garage to the well-equipped fitness center, grilling stations, and picnic areas, we've cautiously thought of all the details that offer our residents privacy, security, serenity, and fun. Hang out with friends on the rooftop terrace, quiet your mind in the yoga studio, or get the feeling of a permanent weekend getaway by spending some quality time by the pool. With the extensive list of amenities, there's something for every resident to enjoy.Our exceptional, riverfront location is just minutes from downtown Pittsburgh and popular Butler Street in the Lawrenceville neighborhood of Pittsburgh, PA or, according to TIME Money, the coolest neighborhood in America right now. The shops, restaurants, and bars within walking distance are sure to spice up your social life. And the boutiques, coffee shops and theatres offer a different vibe to mingle with your neighbors.The neighborhood, amenities, and dedicated staff make The Foundry one of the most desirable places to rent in Pittsburgh, PA. Take a glimpse into our welcoming community by browsing through the photo gallery and contact us today for a personal tour of your future home!

Description:
This is a gorgeous well-maintained 3-bedroom unit on the first floor conveniently located in North Oakland/Shadyside with a great walk score 86. This unit comes with one modern bathroom, all hardwood-like floors, and a fully-equipped kitchen. The modern kitchen has a large stainless-steel double door fridge (with cool water dispenser), a dishwasher, a range, a range-top microwave oven, and a marble countertop. The modern bathroom is equipped with an updated bathtub. exhaust fan, and ceramic tiles walls and floors, updated faucets, toilets, etc. This unit also is equipped with a central air conditioning system for your convenience in the hot summer time. Moreover, the house is well insulated to save energy (means lower heating gas costs in the winter). Another advantage of this unit is its direct access to the laundry center in the basement through a locked door.

For your convenience, the unit has on-site coin-operated laundry center in the basement and a full bathroom. For your security, the unit has motion-sensor outdoor lights and surveillance cameras. What's more, the private fenced backyard is ideal for summer BBQ. Also, the basement has a spacious storage area with a new dry concrete floor. 

What's more, this unit has a large concrete backyard for BBQ and a large concrete parking space (for 4 cars). Off-street parking is $50/month/car. A bike shlter is conventienly available in the front of the house.

To provide better security, the property has motion sensor lights and 7x24 surveillance cameras.

This unit is conveniently located in the North Oakland/Shadyside area. Just about 5 minutes walk to PNC Bank, Einstein Bros breakfast or many restaurants (Chinese, Chipotle, KFC, Pizza, Qdoba, Penn subs, etc.) and a 24-hour convenience store (GetGo) with hot food kitchen. The main bus line is right at the corner that takes you to Oakland (Pitt/CMU campuses and UPMC hospitals) and downtown. Moreover, Pitt/CMU campus, food court, grocery stores are all in the walking distance. Pitt/CMU shuttle stop is just one block away.

This property is managed and owned by the General Realty Management, Ltd with a reliable dedicate team for maintenance and management for 12+ years in the Pittsburgh area.
Terms:
- Application fee: $35/person
- Off-street parking: $50/month/car

In addition to the rent, Tenants pay water/sewer $35/person/month, plus gas and electricity. Application fee: $35/person.Read less

Description: A distinct Pittsburgh landmark, constructed in 1921 in the midst of the downtown skyline and the Monongahela River, Terminal 21 originated as a focal point where produce and livestock met rail and industrial industries. The decades have seen this freight terminal and warehouse shift in focus to residential living, and its industrial form has long resonated with visitors and residents.Originally put to a different, industrial use, but now re-purposed to meet the current needs of a constantly evolving city, Terminal 21 fits with Pittsburghs culture of reinvention. Industry was once the heart that drove the energy of the city. Now, the emerging technological economy means room for growth within the community and for the professionals who live in it.With a comfortable modern feel inspired by the sites local heritage and history, Terminal 21 allows you to make the most of urban living. Centrally located, and primed for easy access to attractions and events throughout the city, Terminal 21 is still the center of a vibrant community and a welcoming stop on lifes journey.

Description: Located atop Pittsburgh's most famous vantage point, this revitalized Historic Landmark is the neighborhood's first contemporary loft-style apartments. Boasting 67 units of modern, urban living - studio, 1-Bedroom, 2-Bedroom, 3-Bedroom, and 1-2-Bedroom Townhouse units housed in the former Prospect School (1931), an Art Deco-style building listed on the National Register of Historic Places. It is within walking distance of both the Grandview Avenue and Shiloh Street commercial districts as well as Emerald View Park, which has miles of hiking trails featuring panoramic views of the city. Residents will have an easy, visually-inspiring, commute to downtown via the Monongahela Incline or by car via the PJ McArdle Roadway. Tenants pay an additional fee's for parking($45.00/month) and water ($45.00/month). Our Pet Fee is a non-refundable $250 upon move in, then $25/month per pet.12 months

Description:
This is a first floor apartment located in group of buildings which have been completely remodeled. It features hardwood floors in the living room & bedroom and ceramic floors in the bathroom & kitchen. The kitchen has custom cabinets and granite counters. This apartment has private in unit laundry, large windows, ceiling fans, central air, a walk out patio, and ample closets. Landlord pays water, sewage, and trash disposal. Tenant pays gas and electric. 
This complex at 5511 Baum, 5515 Baum and 5519 Baum used to be two large single-family mansions which were built decades ago. Our company bought both mansions in 2012 and turned them into 27 apartments. We saved some of the original features of the mansions, such as stained-glass windows, but all plumbing, electric, drywall, windows, HVAC and flooring is new. All 27 kitchens and 27 bathrooms are, of course, new.

This property is only blocks from lots of shops and restaurants including Market District, Giant Eagle-Shadyside, Aldi, Rite Aid, Crazy Mocha, Wendy's, Panera and so much more. The busway to quickly get you downtown is only a 5 minute walk away.

Description: Originally known as the Commonwealth Trust Bank, this historic tower has been serving the people of Downtown Pittsburgh for over a hundred years. Today, the building has been reborn—with stunning, light-filled modern apartment homes and amazing amenities, all within a timeless monument right in Pittsburgh’s Fourth Avenue Historic District. Throughout the iconic tower, you’ll find some of the best amenity spaces in Pittsburgh. Come explore, and you’ll find a stunning outdoor roof terrace, a 2-story club \u0026 game room, and even a bicycle garage tucked away in the bank’s original vault. With a completely reimagined interior and unbelievable skyline and river views, The Commonwealth Building has become home to stunning boutique living spaces that combine the best of both worlds—old-world craftsmanship, with modern simplicity and style. Clubroom, Den, Library/Billiards Room, On-site Management, Package Lockers, Roofdeck with Grilling Station, Storage Lockers, Terrace

Friendship - 1BR Apartment With All Utilities Included - Our Friendship apartments for rent in Pittsburgh are situated alongside Shadyside and Bloomfield allowing residents to enjoy all the nightlife, eateries and shopping that comes with the territory. Friendship is one of the few areas left in Pittsburgh that still has most of its traditional Victorian buildings. Description:
Welcome home to Highland Village! Your relaxed suburban experience starts at our townhouse community in Pittsburgh, PA. Come home to our newly-built two and three-bedroom townhomes for rent in the peaceful setting of the North Hills, complete with amenities to make your life easy. Make use of our two-car garages, energy efficient appliances, spacious layouts, and an outdoor deck. Embrace the deluxe finishes, high ceilings, granite countertops, hardwood flooring, built-in kitchen islands and in-unit washer and dryer. Move into a quiet neighborhood with beautifully landscaped streets and friendly neighbors. Plus, let the 24-hour maintenance and management team take care of your questions or concerns around the clock!

There’s even more to love... Live seconds away from Pittsburgh’s major highways and enjoy a quick commute to Pittsburgh’s top employers and the bustling business district of downtown. The onramp to the highway is just minutes away, getting you from place to place in no time. The lively neighborhood is filled with excellent entertainment, dining, and shopping options! Hit the lake at North Park, play a round at Kniess’ Miniature Golf with the kids, or try out some of the area’s most popular restaurants. Grocery shop nearby at Aldi and Kuhn’s Market or enjoy some retail therapy at Ross Park Mall, the Block at Northway, and along McKnight Road. And trust us, it’s some of the best retail in town! Beautiful townhomes in an excellent location, what more could you want?

Contact us today and come see what ‘home sweet home’ really feels like! Cable/Internet Ready, Efficient Appliances, High Ceilings

Description: Escape the commotion and savor the serene atmosphere of the Woodhawk Club Apartments. Nestled in a wooded area in the North Hills of Pittsburgh, our community offers all of the conveniences of city life with the quietude of the urban lifestyle. We offer one and two bedroom apartments equipped with private balconies or patios, in apartment washers and dryers and wood burning fireplaces in select units. The clubhouse is ideal for gatherings and features a big screen TV, bar, indoor hot tub and swimming pool. Other amenities include a lighted tennis court, racquetball court, basketball courts and a fitness center. Located just off of McKnight Road, shopping and dining are only minutes away. Commuters will find our community ideal since it is only 15 minutes from downtown Pittsburgh. The office is open 7 days a week for the convenience of our residents and prospective residents. Our friendly staff is available to answer any questions and to make your move as easy as possible. Contact us today to arrange a tour.

Torrente is located in the #1 school district in Western Pennsylvania, Upper St. Clair. This historic community was founded in 1762 and has been a community rich in pride and history ever since. We offer an exceptional location within this community, thoughtfully nestled within Upper St. Clair and close to all the your everyday conveniences as South Hills Village Mall and Whole Foods. Our Residents enjoy a wide array of popular amenities, such as: on-site maintenance with no maintenance fees, on-site storage, garage and underground parking facilities, a 24-Hour Fitness Center, as well as elevators in all the buildings and so much more!

Description: A distinct Pittsburgh landmark, constructed in 1921 in the midst of the downtown skyline and the Monongahela River, Terminal 21 originated as a focal point where produce and livestock met rail and industrial industries. The decades have seen this freight terminal and warehouse shift in focus to residential living, and its industrial form has long resonated with visitors and residents.Originally put to a different, industrial use, but now re-purposed to meet the current needs of a constantly evolving city, Terminal 21 fits with Pittsburghs culture of reinvention. Industry was once the heart that drove the energy of the city. Now, the emerging technological economy means room for growth within the community and for the professionals who live in it.With a comfortable modern feel inspired by the sites local heritage and history, Terminal 21 allows you to make the most of urban living. Centrally located, and primed for easy access to attractions and events throughout the city, Terminal 21 is still the center of a vibrant community and a welcoming stop on lifes journey.

Description: The Brix at 26, a Hudson Property, ties historic architecture and modern, upscale boutique living, while offering residents immediate access to the luxuries of the Southside Works area of Pittsburgh. Originally constructed in 1908 for Pittsburgh Mercantile Company and renovated into a beautiful apartment community in 2013, The Brix at 26 preserves the history of the building in a modern and progressive way. Residents indulge in casual sophistication while enjoying everything this beautiful and exciting area has to offer! The Brix at 26 is ideally located within the Southside Works area and is within walking distance to the riverfront trail and many of the best restaurants and nightlife that the Southside has to offer. \n\nWoof Woof, Meow Meow! We love your furry, four-legged friends and are happy to welcome your dog(s) and cat(s) ! Description: Built in 1928 as a hotel originally and remodeled into apartments mid-century, the building has 7 stories, 1 passenger elevator, 1 freight elevator, 2 stairwells. Description: Its cool to live hot!Hot Metal Flats is the most commuter-friendly luxury apartment building in the SouthSide Works neighborhood of Pittsburgh. Designed to LEED (Registered) Silver standards, Hot Metal Flats amenities support sustainable living and encourage your active lifestyle.A professional-grade fitness center, over-sized gathering spaces and exterior lighting displays combine to create a vibrant atmosphere. Residents can enjoy the private lounge and bar area, and the outdoor lounge with grills and a sundeck, heated for year-round use! EV charging stations, car sharing, bicycle storage and a bike repair shop on-site inspire greener living. Description: The Brix at 26, a Hudson Property, ties historic architecture and modern, upscale boutique living, while offering residents immediate access to the luxuries of the Southside Works area of Pittsburgh. Originally constructed in 1908 for Pittsburgh Mercantile Company and renovated into a beautiful apartment community in 2013, The Brix at 26 preserves the history of the building in a modern and progressive way. Residents indulge in casual sophistication while enjoying everything this beautiful and exciting area has to offer! The Brix at 26 is ideally located within the Southside Works area and is within walking distance to the riverfront trail and many of the best restaurants and nightlife that the Southside has to offer. \n\nWoof Woof, Meow Meow! Friendship is one of the few areas left in Pittsburgh that still has most of its traditional Victorian buildings. The rentals are close to UPMC Children's Hospital, West Penn Hospital, Pittsburgh Institute for Mortuary Science (PIMS) and many other colleges and universities of Pittsburgh (ie; Carnegie Mellon University [CMU], Duquesne University, Pittsburgh University, Carlow University, Chatham University and many others). Efficient public transportation makes it perfect for hospital employees, businessmen and students alike.

Description: Escape the commotion and savor the serene atmosphere of the Woodhawk Club Apartments. Nestled in a wooded area in the North Hills of Pittsburgh, our community offers all of the conveniences of city life with the quietude of the urban lifestyle. We offer one and two bedroom apartments equipped with private balconies or patios, in apartment washers and dryers and wood burning fireplaces in select units. The clubhouse is ideal for gatherings and features a big screen TV, bar, indoor hot tub and swimming pool. Other amenities include a lighted tennis court, racquetball court, basketball courts and a fitness center. Located just off of McKnight Road, shopping and dining are only minutes away. Commuters will find our community ideal since it is only 15 minutes from downtown Pittsburgh. The office is open 7 days a week for the convenience of our residents and prospective residents. Our friendly staff is available to answer any questions and to make your move as easy as possible. Contact us today to arrange a tour.

Kaufmann's Grand on Fifth offers the most stylish and historic living in the heart of downtown Pittsburgh. Located in the iconic Kaufmann building, Kaufmann's Grand on Fifth mixes the beauties of the past with the luxuries of today. Description: Holiday Park is well-planned, self contained community that\u0027s an integral part of the Pittsburgh area. Within minutes of Holiday Park you will find excellent schools, public transportation, shopping, medical offices, recreation, sports programs, day care facilities and fitness facilities. Located off of Route 286 to Business 22 you will find it convenient to the Pennsylvania Turnpike, the Parkway East, Pittsburgh, Greensburg, Oakland, Shadyside and Squirrel Hill. Enjoy a night out at the Waterfront or South side. Close to the Monroeville Mall you will find great shopping, entertainment and wonderful restaurants. A few of the many highlights of our townhomes include patios, garages, and the conveniences of in house laundry rooms, many include full size washers and dryers. Some of the apartment homes have private balconies for you to relax and enjoy your leisure moments. We also have laundry facilities and off street parking. The two and three bedroom luxury townhomes, nestled in an elegant setting, offer 2.5 baths, eat-in kitchens, dining rooms, garage, balcony and a fireplace. Holiday Park Apartments and Townhomes, we are always there for you. Take advantage of our gift to you when you make your home with us. (All new one year leases include one year membership to YMCA.) You\u0027ll appreciate the Property Concierge Advantage with dedicated and attentive staff, available 24 hours daily. On-site service personnel assures that your living experience at Holiday Park Apartments and Townhomes is enjoyable and carefree. 24 Hour Emergency Maintenance, Balconies and Patios in Select Homes, Close to PA Turnpike and Parkway East, Employer Discounts, Finished Basements - Select Homes, Located near Plum, Monroeville & Murrysville, One & Two Car Garages *Select Units, Pet Friendly (Restrictions Apply), Some with Gas Fireplace, Some with Vaulted Ceilings and Skylights, Storage Available in Select Homes, Upgraded Kitchens, Washer/Dryer Included in Select Homes

Description:
Beautiful 2 Bed/1 Bath Rowhouse Available in Lawrenceville! - Available: JUNE 10th!

Description:
(NOTE: Sorry for the mess in the pictures. The tenants are packing for their move. Better pictures soon!) This beautiful 2 bedroom 1 bath home is brimming with amenities for even the pickiest renters. Very clean, easy to maintain, and spacious with modern features throughout for comfortable living. A large welcoming kitchen and nice cozy living space. 

Right behind Piccolo Forno & Coca Cafe in Central Lawrenceville! One block from Round Corner Cantina, Umami, Franctuary, etc etc etc. Walk to everything! Bars, restaurants, shops, and more. The best location in Pittsburgh. 10 minute commute to Downtown. 5 mins to the Strip District. Right off the 40th St. Bridge exit of Rt. 28. 

Call us for an appointment today! It looks even better in person! 

Amenities:
Fridge, stove/oven (gas), dishwasher, washer/dryer, central A/C, street parking, forced air gas heat, back porch, fireplace, cable ready, hardwood floors, fenced yard

Also, enjoy our RPM Resident Rewards Program! You'll find over 1,000 local and national merchants on the app. Save money on utilities! We also offer a free utility set-up/transfer conciergeservice! We'll help you get the very best prices on utilities and do all the work for you.

Terms:
- Utilities paid by tenant
- Security deposit one month's rent
- Some pets allowed. Monthly pet fee ($35 first pet, $25 for second). Max 2 pets. No deposit!
- $55 application fee per adult for credit/criminal/eviction check
- NO SMOKING (Inside or Outside)
- $25 monthly Resident Rewards fee (utility concierge, coupon app, online payments, etc.)

Background Check:

Credit
- Must have a credit score of 600 or above. Under 600 will still be considered with a cosigner or an additional security deposit of up to 2 months rent.

Income
- Must gross at least 3 times the monthly rent.

References
- We will call previous landlord and employer as well as collect pay stubs.

About us:
Pay rent, request maintenance, and contact your dedicated, professional property manager online or in person.

Real Property ManagementPittsburgh strives to provide quality, safe, clean housing to tenants who want the same.We strive to improve lives and our communities by continuously elevating property management standards.

Description:
Friendship - 1BR Apartment With Parking and Heat Included - Our Friendship apartments for rent in Pittsburgh are situated alongside Shadyside and Bloomfield allowing residents to enjoy all the nightlife, eateries and shopping that comes with the territory. Friendship is one of the few areas left in Pittsburgh that still has most of its traditional Victorian buildings. The rentals are close to UPMC Children's Hospital, West Penn Hospital, Pittsburgh Institute for Mortuary Science (PIMS) and many other colleges and universities of Pittsburgh (ie; Carnegie Mellon University [CMU], Duquesne University, Pittsburgh University, Carlow University, Chatham University and many others). Efficient public transportation makes it perfect for hospital employees, businessmen and students alike.

Description:
Incredible location with outstanding renovations! Welcome to The Venue! This beautiful apartment community is in the heart of Downtown Pittsburgh and offers one-of-a kind river, stadium, and city views. Units offer the best views of PNC Park. Less than two blocks to the T and the Cultural District, The Venue offers amenities and finishes unlike all others. Live at ease with a secured entrance and 24 hour maintenance.  The Venue is professionally managed with onsite management. Be the first to enjoy the following new amenities:

*Spacious Units
*High Ceilings
*New Hardwood Floors
*New Quartz Counter tops
*New Stainless Steel Appliances
*New Back Splash
*New Paint
*New Light Fixtures
*New Laundry Machines in Units
*Fully Equipped Kitchen
*Rooftop Pool
*New Fitness Center
*New Business Center
*Urban Dog Park
*Dog Washing Station
*Luxer One Package Locker
*Pets are Welcome - fees are additional
*Available parking in the attached garage - fees are additional

The Venue is a newly remodeled community within the heart of Downtown Pittsburgh. We are one of the only downtown apartments with a rooftop pool, and the only apartment building with a rooftop dog park! We host monthly resident events like our famous Craw Fish Boil, Pool Party and plenty others. Your apartment may look directly into PNC Field if you are on the riverside, or enjoy views of Downtown Pittsburgh on the city side. Our rooftop deck is great for watching the Steelers, Pirates or Penguin games with a large flat screen TV, gas fireplace, couches, grills and bar to host all your friends! In building parking is also available, so no running through rain or snow to your apartment. Call us today for great specials. We look forward to having you apart of The Venue family!

We are now leasing out our new 48 units for August 1st move in! These units are currently being built out on the 11th & 12th floor of the building. These units are brand new- come and take a tour pick out your unit for Summer or Fall move in? Need to move in earlier? We have many other floorplans available for immediate move in. Give us a call and we are happy to find you your perfect fit at the Venue! Description: The Foundry at 41st is bravely setting new standards for apartment living. Come home to comfort, luxury and endless amenities. Choose from a variety of stylish studios, one or two-bedroom apartments adorned with everything you'd expect from an upscale, resort-style community. Enjoy high-end features and finishes in your unit, a considerate amount of amenities, and contemporary decor designed around Pittsburgh's steel industry and the history of the former foundry located at the apartment building's site.Join us and embrace the mixture of history and modernity in a community that entwines Lawrenceville's industrial roots and evokes a trendy, urban vibe. From the secured parking garage to the well-equipped fitness center, grilling stations, and picnic areas, we've cautiously thought of all the details that offer our residents privacy, security, serenity, and fun. Hang out with friends on the rooftop terrace, quiet your mind in the yoga studio, or get the feeling of a permanent weekend getaway by spending some quality time by the pool. With the extensive list of amenities, there's something for every resident to enjoy.Our exceptional, riverfront location is just minutes from downtown Pittsburgh and popular Butler Street in the Lawrenceville neighborhood of Pittsburgh, PA or, according to TIME Money, the coolest neighborhood in America right now. The shops, restaurants, and bars within walking distance are sure to spice up your social life. And the boutiques, coffee shops and theatres offer a different vibe to mingle with your neighbors.The neighborhood, amenities, and dedicated staff make The Foundry one of the most desirable places to rent in Pittsburgh, PA. Take a glimpse into our welcoming community by browsing through the photo gallery and contact us today for a personal tour of your future home!

Description: Located atop Pittsburgh's most famous vantage point, this revitalized Historic Landmark is the neighborhood's first contemporary loft-style apartments. Boasting 67 units of modern, urban living - studio, 1-Bedroom, 2-Bedroom, 3-Bedroom, and 1-2-Bedroom Townhouse units housed in the former Prospect School (1931), an Art Deco-style building listed on the National Register of Historic Places. It is within walking distance of both the Grandview Avenue and Shiloh Street commercial districts as well as Emerald View Park, which has miles of hiking trails featuring panoramic views of the city. Residents will have an easy, visually-inspiring, commute to downtown via the Monongahela Incline or by car via the PJ McArdle Roadway. Tenants pay an additional fee's for parking($45.00/month) and water ($45.00/month). Our Pet Fee is a non-refundable $250 upon move in, then $25/month per pet.12 months

Description: A distinct Pittsburgh landmark, constructed in 1921 in the midst of the downtown skyline and the Monongahela River, Terminal 21 originated as a focal point where produce and livestock met rail and industrial industries. The decades have seen this freight terminal and warehouse shift in focus to residential living, and its industrial form has long resonated with visitors and residents.Originally put to a different, industrial use, but now re-purposed to meet the current needs of a constantly evolving city, Terminal 21 fits with Pittsburghs culture of reinvention. Industry was once the heart that drove the energy of the city. Now, the emerging technological economy means room for growth within the community and for the professionals who live in it.With a comfortable modern feel inspired by the sites local heritage and history, Terminal 21 allows you to make the most of urban living. Centrally located, and primed for easy access to attractions and events throughout the city, Terminal 21 is still the center of a vibrant community and a welcoming stop on lifes journey.

LEASE TERMS

- $1700 per month, Minimum 12 month lease

Description: Holiday Park is well-planned, self contained community that\u0027s an integral part of the Pittsburgh area. Within minutes of Holiday Park you will find excellent schools, public transportation, shopping, medical offices, recreation, sports programs, day care facilities and fitness facilities. Located off of Route 286 to Business 22 you will find it convenient to the Pennsylvania Turnpike, the Parkway East, Pittsburgh, Greensburg, Oakland, Shadyside and Squirrel Hill. Enjoy a night out at the Waterfront or South side. Close to the Monroeville Mall you will find great shopping, entertainment and wonderful restaurants. A few of the many highlights of our townhomes include patios, garages, and the conveniences of in house laundry rooms, many include full size washers and dryers. Some of the apartment homes have private balconies for you to relax and enjoy your leisure moments. We also have laundry facilities and off street parking. The two and three bedroom luxury townhomes, nestled in an elegant setting, offer 2.5 baths, eat-in kitchens, dining rooms, garage, balcony and a fireplace. Description: Shadyside Commons offers newly renovated 1- and 2- bedroom apartments that combine a contemporary living space with a peaceful environment in the coveted Shadyside neighborhood of Pittsburgh. Built in 1903, the building was constructed as a hardware store for Pittsburgh businessman John Bindle and, over a century later, the 4-story brick building still flaunts its unusually sharp style and quality details. Large brick arches, handsome cornices and oversized industrial windows couple with proximity to downtown Pittsburgh to create your perfect luxury residence. Apartments include modern kitchens and baths, ample closet space with adjustable shelving and custom storage, and in-suite washers \u0026 dryers. Located near the University of Pittsburgh, UPMC-Shadyside, and Carnegie Mellon, Shadyside Commons offers easy access to the city\u0027s parks, shopping, and restaurants, in the vibrant, yet cozy residential neighborhood of Shadyside. Ample Closet Space with Custom Shelving, Central Air Conditioning, Extra Storage, High Ceilings, High Ceilings with Large Windows, Historic Building, Large Closets, Smoke Free Community, USB Ports

Description: The Foundry at 41st is bravely setting new standards for apartment living. Come home to comfort, luxury and endless amenities. Choose from a variety of stylish studios, one or two-bedroom apartments adorned with everything you'd expect from an upscale, resort-style community. Enjoy high-end features and finishes in your unit, a considerate amount of amenities, and contemporary decor designed around Pittsburgh's steel industry and the history of the former foundry located at the apartment building's site.Join us and embrace the mixture of history and modernity in a community that entwines Lawrenceville's industrial roots and evokes a trendy, urban vibe. From the secured parking garage to the well-equipped fitness center, grilling stations, and picnic areas, we've cautiously thought of all the details that offer our residents privacy, security, serenity, and fun. Hang out with friends on the rooftop terrace, quiet your mind in the yoga studio, or get the feeling of a permanent weekend getaway by spending some quality time by the pool. With the extensive list of amenities, there's something for every resident to enjoy.Our exceptional, riverfront location is just minutes from downtown Pittsburgh and popular Butler Street in the Lawrenceville neighborhood of Pittsburgh, PA or, according to TIME Money, the coolest neighborhood in America right now. The shops, restaurants, and bars within walking distance are sure to spice up your social life. And the boutiques, coffee shops and theatres offer a different vibe to mingle with your neighbors.The neighborhood, amenities, and dedicated staff make The Foundry one of the most desirable places to rent in Pittsburgh, PA. Take a glimpse into our welcoming community by browsing through the photo gallery and contact us today for a personal tour of your future home!

Description:
AVAILABLE MAY 15th! 
Beautifully renovated home in the Squirrel Hill neighborhood in the City of Pittsburgh, available May 15th! This 4 bedroom, 1.5 half bathroom has been remodeled to exhibit an open concept kitchen/dining space equipped with controllable heated marble floors, new white cabinetry, granite counter tops, two new sliding glass doors, and a new bay window. The two sliding glass doors open to a huge rear deck space that over looks absolutely breathtaking views of The Waterfront and Monongahela River! The beautiful deck is enclosed with gorgeous dimming deck lights that are perfect nighttime entertaining! Just off the kitchen lies the main floor powder room, with matching heated marble floors, new wall sconces, and new vanity. The living room has gorgeous hardwood floors that have been refinished and polished. All rooms have been freshly painted to accentuate the cozy see-through fire place to the main floor den. On the second floor are the four bedrooms and newly a renovated full bath with additional storage closets for your convenience. As an added bonus, the home includes 2 washers and 2 dryers to make laundry a breeze! This home offers off-street parking in the rear, along with a beautiful green back-yard. Please feel free to contact me with any additional questions and an opportunity to view this wonderfully renovated home in Squirrel Hill. 

*Pets considered on a case-by-case basis 
**All hardwood floors refinished and polished

Description: Experience the difference. Experience The Alden South Hills. The community is under new ownership and new management with a whole new look. Our newly renovated apartment homes offer comfort, style and convenience. The open floor plans are perfect for entertaining. Your new modern appliances and designer kitchens will be the envy of your friends. Our renovations do not just end with the apartment. Not only will you love to show off your new home, but The Alden is the only community in Pittsburgh to have a stunning NEW 15,000 square foot clubhouse with resident business center and conference room, clubroom for lounging around and a private terrace that overlooks the pool. All of our valued residents will be able to relax poolside with a shimmering pool and sun deck. A great place to escape on a hot day. You will be able to stay fit in our state of the art fitness center! We love pets and we\u0027re the perfect place for you and your four legged friends. Located on 56 park like acres, you have tons of space to take your dog for a walk. The community has two convenient playgrounds, a basketball court with multiple grilling and picnic areas. Your South Hills location is a commuter\u0027s dream. You are just a 5 minute drive to the Library Street T station, just minutes from downtown Pittsburgh, I-376, I-79 and I-51 and multiple bus stops are located throughout the community. Description:
Fabulous, charming and cozy two bedroom two bath (approximately 1800 square ft- lots of space) in the heart of Shadyside. Newly update basement with laundry room, additional bedroom and new bathroom. Newly installed carpet in the first floor bedroom, new bathroom, stainless steel appliances in the kitchen. Two wall units AC, one in the bedroom and another one in the living area. Lovely front porch and one parking garage assigned to this unit. The apartment is within 5 minutes walk to Walnut street. Many restaurants, coffee shops and stores. One of the best neighborhoods in Pittsburgh. Less than 2 miles to CMU and Pitt. Uber to Downtown in 15 minutes. Short walk to Market District for groceries shopping, 5 minutes drive to Wholefood, Traders Joe and Target.

Owner pays for trash, water and sewer. Renter pays for gas, electricity, cable and internet.Read less

Description:
$1400 / 1br - Amazing Loft and location close Carson Street, in lower (South Side Slopes)
 
1BR / 1Ba available now. 

Apartment 
w/d in unit 
off-street parking 
Up for rent is a truly stunning 1 bedroom apartment in the heart of South Side. This building has been fully renovated in a modern and contemporary design.

It features an open floor plan witch creates a very spacious feel to the apartment.

This is a perfect apartment if you are looking to find an awesome place to live in one of Pittsburgh finest neighborhoods. 

Situated in a European like area of Pittsburgh. It's a 5-minute walk to Carson Street, South Side works, health clubs, restaurants and Movie Theater. It's close, but it's situated in a quite park like setting on the lower slopes.

It has a great view of the South Side, downtown, Oakland, UPMC, University of Pittsburgh and Carnegie Mellon University.

It is centrally located with easy access within minutes to Downtown, Duquesne University and 10 to 15 minutes to Oakland, University of Pittsburgh, Carnegie Mellon University, UPMC Hospitals, Shadyside, Bakery square, Google, Whole foods, Trader Joe's and Squirrel Hill and the East End. 

Just minutes from Carson Amenities

Large one bedroom comes with:
Two floors of living space
Large loft Bedroom on second floor,
Office desk space,
2 Skylights,
2 Large Private deck, with an unforgettable view
Gas Grill on second deck
Off street parking
Washer and dryer in unit
Dishwasher,
New stainless steel appliances and 
Microwave
Granite Countertop
Air conditioning.

Insulated for energy savings,
Installed with new energy security energy efficient windows and 
Equipped with new cherry bamboo flooring.

Available: May 15, 2021

Price $1400. 
Plus Gas, Electric and water
Very low utilities bills

Lease, until May 31 2021.

Testimonials from tenants

Previous tenant
"Quite simply, this is by far the best place I have ever lived. From the stunning view, to the easy access to all that Southside has to offer, I couldn't have imagined securing a better deal than I did. The skylights always created beautiful mornings, and the view from the back balcony created some really great memories. Walt was a fantastic apartment manager, always ready and able to assist at a moment's notice. I would recommend this apartment to anyone and would be happy to talk about it with a potential leasee seeking to gain insight from a former tenant".

Junior M (Last name withheld for privacy)

Previous tenant.
I rented the 2701 Mission St apartment for one year... it was amazing. I loved the location, the south side slopes, walking distance to Carson Street. The apartment was just off the city public steps, so perfect for me to walk to work as well as go out with friends on evenings and weekends. Parking was never a problem between my own parking spot at the bottom of the house or free street parking at the top. The neighbors were all very nice. Tons of peace and quiet, a spectacular view and great private porch to enjoy it on. 

I'll add Walt was a great apartment manager and awesome with communication. Quickly responded if I ever had any problems with the apartment, which I never did. And would be mindful of my privacy if ever he needed to swing by. I would recommend this unit to anyone.
This opportunity will not last long. Text or email today with your phone number to set up an appointment, or give us a call.

No pets 
No smokingRead less

Description: Welcome Home to Morgan at North ShoreMorgan at North Shore apartments are nestled along the Allegheny River across from Downtown Pittsburgh, PA. Live less than 1 mile from Heinz Field and PNC Park. Our apartments offer residents the suburban apartment feel in a private urban setting. Inside our one and two-bedroom apartments, you will find wood-style plank flooring, oversized closets & storage, washer & dryer, kitchen with pantry, and a private patio or balcony. We also have a two-bedroom with a den, perfect for a home office or extra room for quests! Residents come home to a clubhouse with resident lounge, resort-style heated pool, fitness center, grilling station, multiple green-space areas, and business center. Residents also have direct access to the Three Rivers Heritage Trail. Our Pittsburgh apartments are located in a fantastic location and offer everything you need to feel right at home!

Description: A distinct Pittsburgh landmark, constructed in 1921 in the midst of the downtown skyline and the Monongahela River, Terminal 21 originated as a focal point where produce and livestock met rail and industrial industries. The decades have seen this freight terminal and warehouse shift in focus to residential living, and its industrial form has long resonated with visitors and residents.Originally put to a different, industrial use, but now re-purposed to meet the current needs of a constantly evolving city, Terminal 21 fits with Pittsburghs culture of reinvention. Industry was once the heart that drove the energy of the city. Now, the emerging technological economy means room for growth within the community and for the professionals who live in it.With a comfortable modern feel inspired by the sites local heritage and history, Terminal 21 allows you to make the most of urban living. Centrally located, and primed for easy access to attractions and events throughout the city, Terminal 21 is still the center of a vibrant community and a welcoming stop on lifes journey.

Description: Built in 1928 as a hotel originally and remodeled into apartments mid-century, the building has 7 stories, 1 passenger elevator, 1 freight elevator, 2 stairwells. Coin operated laundry is available in the basement. All utilities are included in the rent. The apartments at The Frontenac include one bedrooms, studios, and efficiencies. On each floor there are 9 studios, 1 efficiency and 1 one bedroom for a total of 70 units. The apartments all get lots of daylight and all have hardwood floors in the living areas.Flexible.
