Description: At Park West 205, you won't have to compromise when choosing your new home. Whether it's a convenient location, an affordable price point, or a custom luxury design at the top of your wish list, Park West 205 has you covered. Our brand-new apartments have a modern design with smart custom finishes. The open floorplans feature master suites with over-sized walk-in closets, a designer kitchen with an island dining/prep area that include stainless steel appliances, full sized washer and dryers in every unit and so much more. Not only are the apartments luxurious, our amenities are as well! You can picture yourself entertaining friends in our impressive industrial-inspired clubhouse replete with multiple smart TVs, a 24 hour coffee station, shuffleboard and pub area or over drinks at the oversized custom bar. You can also start getting after those fitness gains in our 24-hour gym or enjoy the outdoor space by the heated pool, commercial grilling areas or relaxing by the fire pit.

Description: Holiday Park is well-planned, self contained community that\u0027s an integral part of the Pittsburgh area. Within minutes of Holiday Park you will find excellent schools, public transportation, shopping, medical offices, recreation, sports programs, day care facilities and fitness facilities. Located off of Route 286 to Business 22 you will find it convenient to the Pennsylvania Turnpike, the Parkway East, Pittsburgh, Greensburg, Oakland, Shadyside and Squirrel Hill. Enjoy a night out at the Waterfront or South side. Close to the Monroeville Mall you will find great shopping, entertainment and wonderful restaurants. A few of the many highlights of our townhomes include patios, garages, and the conveniences of in house laundry rooms, many include full size washers and dryers. Some of the apartment homes have private balconies for you to relax and enjoy your leisure moments. We also have laundry facilities and off street parking. The two and three bedroom luxury townhomes, nestled in an elegant setting, offer 2.5 baths, eat-in kitchens, dining rooms, garage, balcony and a fireplace. Holiday Park Apartments and Townhomes, we are always there for you. Take advantage of our gift to you when you make your home with us. (All new one year leases include one year membership to YMCA.) You\u0027ll appreciate the Property Concierge Advantage with dedicated and attentive staff, available 24 hours daily. On-site service personnel assures that your living experience at Holiday Park Apartments and Townhomes is enjoyable and carefree. 24 Hour Emergency Maintenance, Balconies and Patios in Select Homes, Close to PA Turnpike and Parkway East, Employer Discounts, Finished Basements - Select Homes, Located near Plum, Monroeville & Murrysville, One & Two Car Garages *Select Units, Pet Friendly (Restrictions Apply), Some with Gas Fireplace, Some with Vaulted Ceilings and Skylights, Storage Available in Select Homes, Upgraded Kitchens, Washer/Dryer Included in Select Homes

Description: Welcome to the Cosmopolitan Apartments! Our brand new apartment community offers modern living at it's finest in a location that is equally as impressive.Treat yourself to convenient, upscale living in an apartment community like no other at the Cosmopolitan Apartments in Ross Township, just outside Pittsburgh, PA. Large open floor plans with one and two-bedroom options are the perfect complement to your modern lifestyle. Gourmet kitchens complete with quartz countertops, a full range of stainless steel appliances, and a breakfast bar brighten your day, while the private patio or balcony creates a unique outdoor space all your own.Our new community is located in the charming North Hills neighborhood, close to I-279 for a quick commute to downtown Pittsburgh. We are also situated in the highly rated North Hills School District. As a resident, you will enjoy a luxury package of community amenities full of health-boosting and high-tech benefits to enhance your lifestyle. De-stress with a great read on our rooftop terrace and sundeck. The fitness center is stocked with free weights and cardio machines, and is open 24 hours a day so you can always find the right time for a workout.No matter what lifestyle you enjoy, you'll love our beautiful, pet friendly living spaces at Cosmopolitan, an apartment community like no other. Once you've browsed through our photo gallery and seen what we have to offer, give us a call to schedule a tour or go ahead and apply online today. We can't wait to welcome you to your new home!

Description:
Highland Park - 2BR Apartment With Off Street Parking - Our Highland Park apartments for rent in Pittsburgh are just down the road from Route 28 as well as along Pittsburgh's main bus lines making it easy to get to many hospitals (UMPC, West Penn), colleges and universities (ie; Carnegie Mellon University [CMU], Duquesne University, Pittsburgh University, Carlow University, Chatham University and many others) and various grocery stores and shopping areas. Highland Park is a quaint neighborhood located directly past the Pittsburgh Zoo. Description: Welcome to the Cosmopolitan Apartments! Our brand new apartment community offers modern living at it's finest in a location that is equally as impressive.Treat yourself to convenient, upscale living in an apartment community like no other at the Cosmopolitan Apartments in Ross Township, just outside Pittsburgh, PA. Large open floor plans with one and two-bedroom options are the perfect complement to your modern lifestyle. Gourmet kitchens complete with quartz countertops, a full range of stainless steel appliances, and a breakfast bar brighten your day, while the private patio or balcony creates a unique outdoor space all your own.Our new community is located in the charming North Hills neighborhood, close to I-279 for a quick commute to downtown Pittsburgh. We are also situated in the highly rated North Hills School District. As a resident, you will enjoy a luxury package of community amenities full of health-boosting and high-tech benefits to enhance your lifestyle. De-stress with a great read on our rooftop terrace and sundeck. The fitness center is stocked with free weights and cardio machines, and is open 24 hours a day so you can always find the right time for a workout.No matter what lifestyle you enjoy, you'll love our beautiful, pet friendly living spaces at Cosmopolitan, an apartment community like no other. Once you've browsed through our photo gallery and seen what we have to offer, give us a call to schedule a tour or go ahead and apply online today. We can't wait to welcome you to your new home!

Description:
East Liberty - 3BR 2BA Apartment With Back Yard and In Suite Laundry - Our apartments for rent in East Liberty have a very unique and traditional feel to them. Description:
This spacious, second floor 2 bedroom unit is located in a group of buildings situated on a quiet street where Edgewood meets Swissvale. It features oak cabinets, granite countertops, full size refrigerator, dishwasher, built in microwave, hardwood floors, multiple spacious closets, window ac, tile bathroom, off street parking, and more. 
Landlord pays water, sewage, trash, and gas for your heat and hot water. Tenant pays electric. 
We have an opening in our Edgewood/Swissvale apartments! They are located a couple of blocks from the Edgewood Towne Center, the Busway, and Regent Square.
There is coin operated laundry and extra storage in the basement. 
One off street parking space is included and covered parking spaces may be available for additional rent. 
If your pet is friendly, we are pet friendly. We require vaccinations and licenses for pets but do not charge additional rent or fees. 
We run a thorough credit and background check on all applicants. 
If you work in the city and live here you would likely save money on the lower income tax.Read less

Description:
This second floor apartment features private laundry in unit, hardwood floors, high efficiency furnace with central air, double pane windows, ceiling fans, The ceramic kitchen has a dishwasher, built in microwave, gas stove, garbage disposal, and loads of cabinets. Each bedroom is roughly equal in size and has ample closets. 
Landlord pays water, sewage, and trash. Tenants pay gas and electric. Both of these will be very reasonable because of new insulation and double pane windows with Argon. 
This is a row of 2 duplexes on the corner of Fifth and McPherson that were recently totally gutted and redone. It is conveniently located a couple blocks from Bakery Square, Mellon Park, Google, Trader Joe's, 3 parks, and close to buses. There is off street parking behind the building, easy on street parking, and extra storage in the basement. 
All of our properties are pet friendly for friendly pets with a two pet maximum. We require proof of vaccinations and licenses, but we do not charge additional rent or fees for pets.Read less

Description: Holiday Park is well-planned, self contained community that\u0027s an integral part of the Pittsburgh area. Within minutes of Holiday Park you will find excellent schools, public transportation, shopping, medical offices, recreation, sports programs, day care facilities and fitness facilities. Located off of Route 286 to Business 22 you will find it convenient to the Pennsylvania Turnpike, the Parkway East, Pittsburgh, Greensburg, Oakland, Shadyside and Squirrel Hill. Enjoy a night out at the Waterfront or South side. Close to the Monroeville Mall you will find great shopping, entertainment and wonderful restaurants. A few of the many highlights of our townhomes include patios, garages, and the conveniences of in house laundry rooms, many include full size washers and dryers. Some of the apartment homes have private balconies for you to relax and enjoy your leisure moments. We also have laundry facilities and off street parking. The two and three bedroom luxury townhomes, nestled in an elegant setting, offer 2.5 baths, eat-in kitchens, dining rooms, garage, balcony and a fireplace. Holiday Park Apartments and Townhomes, we are always there for you. Take advantage of our gift to you when you make your home with us. (All new one year leases include one year membership to YMCA.) You\u0027ll appreciate the Property Concierge Advantage with dedicated and attentive staff, available 24 hours daily. On-site service personnel assures that your living experience at Holiday Park Apartments and Townhomes is enjoyable and carefree. 24 Hour Emergency Maintenance, Balconies and Patios in Select Homes, Close to PA Turnpike and Parkway East, Employer Discounts, Finished Basements - Select Homes, Located near Plum, Monroeville & Murrysville, One & Two Car Garages *Select Units, Pet Friendly (Restrictions Apply), Some with Gas Fireplace, Some with Vaulted Ceilings and Skylights, Storage Available in Select Homes, Upgraded Kitchens, Washer/Dryer Included in Select Homes

Description: Welcome to your new home at Maiden Bridge & Canongate Apartments. We offer a host of amenities to make your life easy, starting with our on-site management team ready to assist with anything you may need. Conveniently located in the South Hills, we are close to shopping, dining, and parks. Choose from our numerous studio, one-, two-, and three-bedroom floor plans with laundry facilities on every floor, fitness center, swimming pool, bike storage, and more. Apartments offer eat-in kitchen, dishwasher, and air conditioning, and utilities are included in the rent. Just five miles from downtown Pittsburgh, you can easily access shopping, restaurants, museums, and much more. And we are pet friendly, welcoming your dogs and cats to Maiden Bridge & Canongate.

Description: The Brix at 26, a Hudson Property, ties historic architecture and modern, upscale boutique living, while offering residents immediate access to the luxuries of the Southside Works area of Pittsburgh. Originally constructed in 1908 for Pittsburgh Mercantile Company and renovated into a beautiful apartment community in 2013, The Brix at 26 preserves the history of the building in a modern and progressive way. Residents indulge in casual sophistication while enjoying everything this beautiful and exciting area has to offer! The Brix at 26 is ideally located within the Southside Works area and is within walking distance to the riverfront trail and many of the best restaurants and nightlife that the Southside has to offer. \n\nWoof Woof, Meow Meow! We love your furry, four-legged friends and are happy to welcome your dog(s) and cat(s) ! Description:
Incredible location with outstanding renovations! Welcome to The Venue! This beautiful apartment community is in the heart of Downtown Pittsburgh and offers one-of-a kind river, stadium, and city views. Units offer the best views of PNC Park. Less than two blocks to the T and the Cultural District, The Venue offers amenities and finishes unlike all others. Live at ease with a secured entrance and 24 hour maintenance.  The Venue is professionally managed with onsite management. Be the first to enjoy the following new amenities:

*Spacious Units
*High Ceilings
*New Hardwood Floors
*New Quartz Counter tops
*New Stainless Steel Appliances
*New Back Splash
*New Paint
*New Light Fixtures
*New Laundry Machines in Units
*Fully Equipped Kitchen
*Rooftop Pool
*New Fitness Center
*New Business Center
*Urban Dog Park
*Dog Washing Station
*Luxer One Package Locker
*Pets are Welcome - fees are additional
*Available parking in the attached garage - fees are additional

The Venue is a newly remodeled community within the heart of Downtown Pittsburgh. We are one of the only downtown apartments with a rooftop pool, and the only apartment building with a rooftop dog park! We host monthly resident events like our famous Craw Fish Boil, Pool Party and plenty others. Your apartment may look directly into PNC Field if you are on the riverside, or enjoy views of Downtown Pittsburgh on the city side. Our rooftop deck is great for watching the Steelers, Pirates or Penguin games with a large flat screen TV, gas fireplace, couches, grills and bar to host all your friends! In building parking is also available, so no running through rain or snow to your apartment. Call us today for great specials. We look forward to having you apart of The Venue family!

We are now leasing out our new 48 units for August 1st move in! These units are currently being built out on the 11th & 12th floor of the building. These units are brand new- come and take a tour pick out your unit for Summer or Fall move in? Need to move in earlier? We have many other floorplans available for immediate move in. Give us a call and we are happy to find you your perfect fit at the Venue! Newly renovated 1 bedroom apartment in Highland Park/Shadyside! - This newly renovated 1 bedroom apartment is located in the heart of Highland Park with convenient access to all Downtown Highland Park, Shadyside, and East Liberty has to offer. With walkability to local attractions such as restaurants, retail, night life and public transportation, this location is ideal! The home features original hardwood floors, a spacious bedroom, walk-in closet and tons of natural light! It is fully equipped with a large eat-in kitchen that includes a stainless steel range, dishwasher, and refrigerator. Additionally, the home offers a large backyard which includes one off street parking space and coin-op laundry in the basement. ALL utilities are included in rent!

This apartment will be move-in ready August 6th! Reach out today to schedule your tour!

Lindsey

Description:
This is a 2nd floor apartment which has been beautifully renovated. The updates include hardwood floors, ceramic bathroom with full size tub, large windows, ceiling fans, decorative brick fireplace, and ample closets. The ceramic kitchen looks out into the living room and has a dishwasher, built in microwave, glass top stove, refrigerator, and garbage disposal. Landlord pays water, sewage & trash. Tenant pays electric. The heat is electric and a window AC unit will be installed upon request. 
This is a completely renovated 5 unit building in one of the most sought after neighborhoods in Pittsburgh. It is only blocks from the busway, the shops on Walnut, Shadyside Hospital, Aldi, Market District, Whole Foods, and more. The common hallway of this former mansion has original wainscotting and a beautiful window seat between the first and second floor. Each unit has tall ceilings, large windows, ceiling fans, hardwood floors, and ceramic kitchens and baths. There is a covered front porch, coin operated laundry on the 1st floor, storage in the basement, and relatively easy on street parking. 
All of our properties are pet friendly for friendly pets with a two pet maximum. We require proof of vaccinations and licenses, but we do not charge additional rent or fees for pets.Read less

Description: 62+, senior restricted community. All Utilities Included! Limited availability!Hillcrest Residences is a newly constructed community located in the Carrick neighborhood, just down the street from Brentwood Towne Square. A desirable living option for the older generation in search of an updated, comfortable, and social living experience. This community is located near a vast variety of shopping and dining, but maintains a neighborhood feel.Hillcrest Residences offers a quality living option with beautifully landscaped grounds, spacious floor plans, and modern amenities without leaving the Carrick neighborhood. Our valued residents will have the prestige to live in beautiful newly constructed one and two bedroom apartment homes. Hillcrest makes it easy to mingle with neighbors, friends, and family in our spacious resident lounge and beautifully landscaped grounds. We make sure you have the opportunity for a healthy and tranquil living experience with a private room for health services, modern fitness center, and sun room.In addition, Hillcrest Residences is located next to Rite Aid, Dunkin Donuts, and PNC Bank making every day conveniences just steps away. Connect with the neighborhood with a short bus ride to Station Square, where you will find local events, over a dozen restaurants, and the opportunity to explore local Art and Music events. Travel to SouthSide Works, The Mall at Robinson, or Ross Park Mall to enjoy a day at the spa, watch a newly released movie, a gourmet meal, and so much more.Contact our professional leasing staff today and find out how you can become a valued member of our community! Income restrictions apply to select homes. Rent is subject to change at anytime. Layouts and finishes may vary by home. EHO and ADA. TTY: 711One Year

Description: Brand new City Vista offers one, two and three bedroom apartment homes in a beautiful setting that combines the comforts of home with superior resident services and outstanding community amenities. Our unsurpassed location, just one exit outside of Pittsburgh gives you the convenience of being just minutes from the area\u0027s best shopping, dining and entertainment! Enjoy our amazing resort-style swimming pool, 24/7 fitness/wellness center, cyber cafe, grilling and fire pit areas as well as an abundance of green space! Our easy no-tunnel commute to Downtown Pittsburgh and easy access to both 376 E/W and 79 N/S make City Vista the perfect location for wherever you work or play! Our apartments boast beautiful kitchens equipped icemakers, dishwashers, garbage disposals, and tons of cabinet and counter space! Description: Located atop Pittsburgh's most famous vantage point, this revitalized Historic Landmark is the neighborhood's first contemporary loft-style apartments. Boasting 67 units of modern, urban living - studio, 1-Bedroom, 2-Bedroom, 3-Bedroom, and 1-2-Bedroom Townhouse units housed in the former Prospect School (1931), an Art Deco-style building listed on the National Register of Historic Places. It is within walking distance of both the Grandview Avenue and Shiloh Street commercial districts as well as Emerald View Park, which has miles of hiking trails featuring panoramic views of the city. Residents will have an easy, visually-inspiring, commute to downtown via the Monongahela Incline or by car via the PJ McArdle Roadway. Tenants pay an additional fee's for parking($45.00/month) and water ($45.00/month). Our Pet Fee is a non-refundable $250 upon move in, then $25/month per pet.12 months

Description:
Incredible location with outstanding renovations! Welcome to The Venue! This beautiful apartment community is in the heart of Downtown Pittsburgh and offers one-of-a kind river, stadium, and city views. Units offer the best views of PNC Park. Less than two blocks to the T and the Cultural District, The Venue offers amenities and finishes unlike all others. Live at ease with a secured entrance and 24 hour maintenance.  The Venue is professionally managed with onsite management. Be the first to enjoy the following new amenities:

*Spacious Units
*High Ceilings

*New Back Splash

The Venue is a newly remodeled community within the heart of Downtown Pittsburgh. We are one of the only downtown apartments with a rooftop pool, and the only apartment building with a rooftop dog park! We host monthly resident events like our famous Craw Fish Boil, Pool Party and plenty others. Your apartment may look directly into PNC Field if you are on the riverside, or enjoy views of Downtown Pittsburgh on the city side. Our rooftop deck is great for watching the Steelers, Pirates or Penguin games with a large flat screen TV, gas fireplace, couches, grills and bar to host all your friends! In building parking is also available, so no running through rain or snow to your apartment. Call us today for great specials. We look forward to having you apart of The Venue family!

We are now leasing out our new 48 units for August 1st move in! These units are currently being built out on the 11th & 12th floor of the building. Description: A distinct Pittsburgh landmark, constructed in 1921 in the midst of the downtown skyline and the Monongahela River, Terminal 21 originated as a focal point where produce and livestock met rail and industrial industries. The decades have seen this freight terminal and warehouse shift in focus to residential living, and its industrial form has long resonated with visitors and residents.Originally put to a different, industrial use, but now re-purposed to meet the current needs of a constantly evolving city, Terminal 21 fits with Pittsburghs culture of reinvention. Industry was once the heart that drove the energy of the city. Now, the emerging technological economy means room for growth within the community and for the professionals who live in it.With a comfortable modern feel inspired by the sites local heritage and history, Terminal 21 allows you to make the most of urban living. Centrally located, and primed for easy access to attractions and events throughout the city, Terminal 21 is still the center of a vibrant community and a welcoming stop on lifes journey.

Description:
This 3rd floor apartment features in unit laundry, hardwood floors throughout, large windows, central AC, ceiling fans, and plenty of closet space. The custom kitchen is open to the living room and has granite counters with lots of character, garbage disposal, track & pendant lighting, and stainless steel appliances including side by side fridge with water and icemaker in the door, dishwasher, built in microwave, and gas stove. The bedrooms are each about the same size and one has a walk in closet. The large bathroom features a double vanity, full size tub, and ceramic tile. 
This beautifully renovated brick building is on the corner of Stanton Ave. & N. Negley Ave. in East Liberty. It has been completely redone including new electrical, insulation, windows, plumbing, and HVAC. 
There is easy on street parking without a permit. All of our properties are pet friendly for friendly pets with a two pet maximum. We require proof of rabies vaccinations (and licenses for dogs), but we do not charge additional rent or fees for pets.Read less

Originally constructed in 1908 for Pittsburgh Mercantile Company and renovated into a beautiful apartment community in 2013, The Brix at 26 preserves the history of the building in a modern and progressive way. Residents indulge in casual sophistication while enjoying everything this beautiful and exciting area has to offer! Description:

This is a charming one bedroom apartment in a side by side duplex. First floor features a living room, kitchen with a separate dining area, and a half bathroom (powder room). The second floor is an oversize bedroom with a large walk-in closet and a full bathroom.

Industry was once the heart that drove the energy of the city. Now, the emerging technological economy means room for growth within the community and for the professionals who live in it.With a comfortable modern feel inspired by the sites local heritage and history, Terminal 21 allows you to make the most of urban living. Centrally located, and primed for easy access to attractions and events throughout the city, Terminal 21 is still the center of a vibrant community and a welcoming stop on lifes journey.

Description:
This spacious, second floor 2 bedroom unit is located in a group of buildings situated on a quiet street where Edgewood meets Swissvale. It features oak cabinets, granite countertops, full size refrigerator, dishwasher, built in microwave, hardwood floors, multiple spacious closets, window ac, tile bathroom, off street parking, and more. 
Landlord pays water, sewage, trash, and gas for your heat and hot water. Tenant pays electric. 
We have an opening in our Edgewood/Swissvale apartments! They are located a couple of blocks from the Edgewood Towne Center, the Busway, and Regent Square.
There is coin operated laundry and extra storage in the basement. 
One off street parking space is included and covered parking spaces may be available for additional rent. 
If your pet is friendly, we are pet friendly. We require vaccinations and licenses for pets but do not charge additional rent or fees. 
We run a thorough credit and background check on all applicants. 
If you work in the city and live here you would likely save money on the lower income tax.Read less

Description:
Charming 3-bedroom house in Mt. Lebanon, great location, next to one of the best elementary schools in PA (Licoln Elementary) and playground, baseball field, tennis and basketball courts. Classic style, original built-ins, hardwood, tile and carpeting throughout. Semi-open living room and dining room, kitchen with quartz countertops and new appliaces, three bedrooms, including lots of space in the master bedroom, and a full bathroom on the second floor, deck perfect for grilling and meals in the warm weather, storage, powder room and laundry in the basement, integral garage with access to basement, energy-efficient A/C. One block away from Beverly Road shops, multiple bus lines, conveniently located to trolley and minutes from downtown. Lovely neighborhood with wonderful neighbors, steps from away from everything you need. Don't wait any longer!

The Rent is $2400 due the first of every month, with a $2400 security deposit due 15 days prior to first day of lease. The lease is for 12 months, with an option to sign on for another year after that. Small pets permitted with permission from owner. The home is to be used for residential purposes, a small family of no more than 5. Renters responsible for all utilities. Credit and background check required. No smoking.Read less

Description: A distinct Pittsburgh landmark, constructed in 1921 in the midst of the downtown skyline and the Monongahela River, Terminal 21 originated as a focal point where produce and livestock met rail and industrial industries. The decades have seen this freight terminal and warehouse shift in focus to residential living, and its industrial form has long resonated with visitors and residents.Originally put to a different, industrial use, but now re-purposed to meet the current needs of a constantly evolving city, Terminal 21 fits with Pittsburghs culture of reinvention. Industry was once the heart that drove the energy of the city. Now, the emerging technological economy means room for growth within the community and for the professionals who live in it.With a comfortable modern feel inspired by the sites local heritage and history, Terminal 21 allows you to make the most of urban living. Centrally located, and primed for easy access to attractions and events throughout the city, Terminal 21 is still the center of a vibrant community and a welcoming stop on lifes journey.

Description: Shadyside Commons offers newly renovated 1- and 2- bedroom apartments that combine a contemporary living space with a peaceful environment in the coveted Shadyside neighborhood of Pittsburgh. Built in 1903, the building was constructed as a hardware store for Pittsburgh businessman John Bindle and, over a century later, the 4-story brick building still flaunts its unusually sharp style and quality details. Large brick arches, handsome cornices and oversized industrial windows couple with proximity to downtown Pittsburgh to create your perfect luxury residence. Apartments include modern kitchens and baths, ample closet space with adjustable shelving and custom storage, and in-suite washers \u0026 dryers. Located near the University of Pittsburgh, UPMC-Shadyside, and Carnegie Mellon, Shadyside Commons offers easy access to the city\u0027s parks, shopping, and restaurants, in the vibrant, yet cozy residential neighborhood of Shadyside. Ample Closet Space with Custom Shelving, Central Air Conditioning, Extra Storage, High Ceilings, High Ceilings with Large Windows, Historic Building, Large Closets, Smoke Free Community, USB Ports

Description:
Bloomfield - 2BR Apartment With Parking and Heat Included - Our Bloomfield apartments for rent in Pittsburgh are located in one of the most traditional locations in Pittsburgh. Our rentals are between Shadyside and Friendship and allow residents to enjoy all their pleasantries without going too far. Bloomfield is extremely lively with many taverns, pubs, shopping and great Italian restaurants. These once single family Victorian mansions now accommodate apartments while keeping much of their traditional style. Furthermore, the apartments for rent are close to UPMC Children's Hospital, West Penn Hospital and Pittsburgh Institute for Mortuary Science (PIMS) and other colleges and universities of Pittsburgh (Carnegie Mellon University [CMU], Duquesne University, Pittsburgh University, Carlow University, Chatham University).

Description: Shadyside Commons offers newly renovated 1- and 2- bedroom apartments that combine a contemporary living space with a peaceful environment in the coveted Shadyside neighborhood of Pittsburgh. Built in 1903, the building was constructed as a hardware store for Pittsburgh businessman John Bindle and, over a century later, the 4-story brick building still flaunts its unusually sharp style and quality details. Large brick arches, handsome cornices and oversized industrial windows couple with proximity to downtown Pittsburgh to create your perfect luxury residence. Apartments include modern kitchens and baths, ample closet space with adjustable shelving and custom storage, and in-suite washers \u0026 dryers. Located near the University of Pittsburgh, UPMC-Shadyside, and Carnegie Mellon, Shadyside Commons offers easy access to the city\u0027s parks, shopping, and restaurants, in the vibrant, yet cozy residential neighborhood of Shadyside. Description: Hobart Court is a no-brainer if you're looking for a comfortable apartment in an ideal location. The building has attractive curb appeal with well-kept landscaping and outdoor space in the courtyard. It holds one and two bedroom units with a handful of different floor plans to choose from. Most units have up-to-date kitchens and bathrooms, large living areas, as well as considerably bright windows. Some units feature original fireplaces, wood-inspired flooring, and ample closet space. Hobart Court has all the makings of a cozy apartment, and the location is the cherry on top! Only five minutes from the campuses of PITT and CMU, just down the road from Schenley Park, and within walking distance to Squirrel Hill's main strip, Murray Ave, you can easily walk to the grocery store, take a stroll to grab a cup of coffee, or to pick up that take-out you've been craving. There are stops at CMU and PITT.

View of owner's neighboring court yard (nearly half acre, trees, pond) and views to Mt Washington and West End bridge. 

1st floor: kitchen with granite counter top island, stainless appliances, exposed brick, fireplace, open stair case, pantry, half bath, stained glass transom. and small private courtyard. 

2nd floor-Open loft floor plan with hardwood floors, two fireplaces, walk in closet, and bath. 

3rd Floor- Hardwood floors, skylight, front dormer with views, and roof top deck. 
Full basement with laundry and ample storage. House insulated with spray insulation. New high efficiency furnace and central AC. 

Side yard. Off street parking.

Owner pays for trash and water. Tenant responsible for gas and electric.Read less

Description:
Tall ceilings and hardwood floors throughout. The unit includes a private porch and entry room on the first floor. The unit is mainly on the second and third floor of the house. There are 5 large bedrooms with a full bathroom on each floor. There is also a shared living room and kitchen. The kitchen is large and includes a fridge, dishwasher, full gas range, double sinks, garbage disposal and flexible kitchen faucet.

The rent is $2800/month. Rent does not include gas or electric but does include water, garbage, and lawn services. The stove and water heater is gas. The unit is allowed pets. The house is located in Friendship and is within walking distance to many shops around. University students are welcome to rent. The parking is on street but free and it is not hard to find a spot.Read less

Description: Holiday Park is well-planned, self contained community that\u0027s an integral part of the Pittsburgh area. Within minutes of Holiday Park you will find excellent schools, public transportation, shopping, medical offices, recreation, sports programs, day care facilities and fitness facilities. Located off of Route 286 to Business 22 you will find it convenient to the Pennsylvania Turnpike, the Parkway East, Pittsburgh, Greensburg, Oakland, Shadyside and Squirrel Hill. Enjoy a night out at the Waterfront or South side. Close to the Monroeville Mall you will find great shopping, entertainment and wonderful restaurants. A few of the many highlights of our townhomes include patios, garages, and the conveniences of in house laundry rooms, many include full size washers and dryers. Some of the apartment homes have private balconies for you to relax and enjoy your leisure moments. We also have laundry facilities and off street parking. The two and three bedroom luxury townhomes, nestled in an elegant setting, offer 2.5 baths, eat-in kitchens, dining rooms, garage, balcony and a fireplace. Description:
2 Bedroom, 1 bathroom first floor unit with great location: easy commute to downtown & walking distance to T. This well-maintained unit has a fantastic open-floor layout with the kitchen opening to the living area. There are hardwood LVT floors throughout. The unit has a new refrigerator, kitchen faucet, and furnace. The basement contains a washer/dryer. Outside you will find a deck and large fenced backyard for your furry friend.

Pet friendly subject to the following: (1) limit 2 pets max (must be obedient/house trained), (2) no restricted dog/pet breeds as determined by insurance company (Akita, American Staffordshire Terrier (Pit Bull), Chow, Presa Canario, Rottweiler, Shar-pei, Wolf Hybrid, any dog mixed predominantly with a listed breed, no Exotic animals or any other animal that is known to display vicious tendencies), (3) 1 pet included in rent; pet rent additional for second pet.

No smoking allowed.

Description: The Foundry at 41st is bravely setting new standards for apartment living. Come home to comfort, luxury and endless amenities. Choose from a variety of stylish studios, one or two-bedroom apartments adorned with everything you'd expect from an upscale, resort-style community. Enjoy high-end features and finishes in your unit, a considerate amount of amenities, and contemporary decor designed around Pittsburgh's steel industry and the history of the former foundry located at the apartment building's site.Join us and embrace the mixture of history and modernity in a community that entwines Lawrenceville's industrial roots and evokes a trendy, urban vibe. From the secured parking garage to the well-equipped fitness center, grilling stations, and picnic areas, we've cautiously thought of all the details that offer our residents privacy, security, serenity, and fun. Hang out with friends on the rooftop terrace, quiet your mind in the yoga studio, or get the feeling of a permanent weekend getaway by spending some quality time by the pool. With the extensive list of amenities, there's something for every resident to enjoy.Our exceptional, riverfront location is just minutes from downtown Pittsburgh and popular Butler Street in the Lawrenceville neighborhood of Pittsburgh, PA or, according to TIME Money, the coolest neighborhood in America right now. The shops, restaurants, and bars within walking distance are sure to spice up your social life. And the boutiques, coffee shops and theatres offer a different vibe to mingle with your neighbors.The neighborhood, amenities, and dedicated staff make The Foundry one of the most desirable places to rent in Pittsburgh, PA. Take a glimpse into our welcoming community by browsing through the photo gallery and contact us today for a personal tour of your future home!

Description: Escape the commotion and savor the serene atmosphere of the Woodhawk Club Apartments. Nestled in a wooded area in the North Hills of Pittsburgh, our community offers all of the conveniences of city life with the quietude of the urban lifestyle. We offer one and two bedroom apartments equipped with private balconies or patios, in apartment washers and dryers and wood burning fireplaces in select units. The clubhouse is ideal for gatherings and features a big screen TV, bar, indoor hot tub and swimming pool. Other amenities include a lighted tennis court, racquetball court, basketball courts and a fitness center. Located just off of McKnight Road, shopping and dining are only minutes away. Commuters will find our community ideal since it is only 15 minutes from downtown Pittsburgh. The office is open 7 days a week for the convenience of our residents and prospective residents. Our friendly staff is available to answer any questions and to make your move as easy as possible. Contact us today to arrange a tour.

Description: Holiday Park is well-planned, self contained community that\u0027s an integral part of the Pittsburgh area. Within minutes of Holiday Park you will find excellent schools, public transportation, shopping, medical offices, recreation, sports programs, day care facilities and fitness facilities. Located off of Route 286 to Business 22 you will find it convenient to the Pennsylvania Turnpike, the Parkway East, Pittsburgh, Greensburg, Oakland, Shadyside and Squirrel Hill. Enjoy a night out at the Waterfront or South side. Close to the Monroeville Mall you will find great shopping, entertainment and wonderful restaurants. A few of the many highlights of our townhomes include patios, garages, and the conveniences of in house laundry rooms, many include full size washers and dryers. Some of the apartment homes have private balconies for you to relax and enjoy your leisure moments. We also have laundry facilities and off street parking. The two and three bedroom luxury townhomes, nestled in an elegant setting, offer 2.5 baths, eat-in kitchens, dining rooms, garage, balcony and a fireplace. Holiday Park Apartments and Townhomes, we are always there for you. Take advantage of our gift to you when you make your home with us. (All new one year leases include one year membership to YMCA.) You\u0027ll appreciate the Property Concierge Advantage with dedicated and attentive staff, available 24 hours daily. On-site service personnel assures that your living experience at Holiday Park Apartments and Townhomes is enjoyable and carefree. 24 Hour Emergency Maintenance, Balconies and Patios in Select Homes, Close to PA Turnpike and Parkway East, Employer Discounts, Finished Basements - Select Homes, Located near Plum, Monroeville & Murrysville, One & Two Car Garages *Select Units, Pet Friendly (Restrictions Apply), Some with Gas Fireplace, Some with Vaulted Ceilings and Skylights, Storage Available in Select Homes, Upgraded Kitchens, Washer/Dryer Included in Select Homes

Side by side duplex with 2 Bedrooms and 1 Bath. House includes a full kitchen with gas range, washer and dryer, and ac unit. The third floor is a stand up attic with a stairway entrance that along with a large basement provide tons of space for extra storage. The basement also has a crowd pleasing, "Pittsburgh toilet." There is a front porch as well as a concrete slab in the back leading onto a small but flat back yard. Great location, just a short walk to the bus stop and a few blocks from the overlook and the incline make this an affordable place to live close to downtown and the southside.

No pets
Renters pay gas and electric
Not Section 8 approved

Joe

Description:
This Town Home is for rent in the East End section of Pittsburgh,Swiss-helm Park area, near Regent Square, and has been completely renovated complete with new kitchen, bathroom, and hardwood floors. 
The First floor has been updated to have an open floor plan, so the living room, dining room and kitchen all flow into each other. Granite Counter-tops in Kitchen, Wet room Style Bath and exposed brick. 
The Second floor is loft style with an open floor plan at 400 Sq feet. 
The home is flooded with natural light, park views, and is very contemporary. Great location sits you a block from Frick Park.
It has both front and back porches, and has a fenced-in backyard complete with large private patio, garden with raised beds for planting and a GREEN rain barrel. 
The home is conveniently located near Regent Square, Swiss-helm Park, Squirrel Hill and Frick Park. A few exits away from UPMC, Pitt, Oakland, Sq Hill, and downtown Pittsburgh.

Description:
City living in the smallest Pgh neighborhood, historic Allegheny West, on the most beautiful street, Beech Ave. Coffee shops, book stores, restaurants, bars, and more just around the corner from the condo. Small building - this is one of just 6 units. Friendly neighborhood, 2 blocks to the park. Unheard of amenity - GARAGE! Space for one car. Convenient first-floor condo (minimal steps into the building and in unit), has tons of natural light, southern exposure, working fireplace, French doors off dining room to outdoor deck, central air conditioning, 2 large bedrooms-both with brand new carpet, 2 full baths, washer/dryer, dishwasher & all other kitchen appliances, smoke-free, secured basement storage. Easy access to all major roads and freeways (within a few blocks), short walk to stadiums, 5 museums, dozens of restaurants. 20 minute walk to downtown. Safe, quaint neighborhood with historic Victorian architecture.

No smoking of any kind inside the condo. Renter pays utilities. Pets *may* be considered.Read less

Description: Holiday Park is well-planned, self contained community that\u0027s an integral part of the Pittsburgh area. Within minutes of Holiday Park you will find excellent schools, public transportation, shopping, medical offices, recreation, sports programs, day care facilities and fitness facilities. Located off of Route 286 to Business 22 you will find it convenient to the Pennsylvania Turnpike, the Parkway East, Pittsburgh, Greensburg, Oakland, Shadyside and Squirrel Hill. Enjoy a night out at the Waterfront or South side. Close to the Monroeville Mall you will find great shopping, entertainment and wonderful restaurants. A few of the many highlights of our townhomes include patios, garages, and the conveniences of in house laundry rooms, many include full size washers and dryers. Some of the apartment homes have private balconies for you to relax and enjoy your leisure moments. We also have laundry facilities and off street parking. The two and three bedroom luxury townhomes, nestled in an elegant setting, offer 2.5 baths, eat-in kitchens, dining rooms, garage, balcony and a fireplace. Holiday Park Apartments and Townhomes, we are always there for you. Take advantage of our gift to you when you make your home with us. (All new one year leases include one year membership to YMCA.) You\u0027ll appreciate the Property Concierge Advantage with dedicated and attentive staff, available 24 hours daily. On-site service personnel assures that your living experience at Holiday Park Apartments and Townhomes is enjoyable and carefree. 24 Hour Emergency Maintenance, Balconies and Patios in Select Homes, Close to PA Turnpike and Parkway East, Employer Discounts, Finished Basements - Select Homes, Located near Plum, Monroeville & Murrysville, One & Two Car Garages *Select Units, Pet Friendly (Restrictions Apply), Some with Gas Fireplace, Some with Vaulted Ceilings and Skylights, Storage Available in Select Homes, Upgraded Kitchens, Washer/Dryer Included in Select Homes

Description: Escape the commotion and savor the serene atmosphere of the Woodhawk Club Apartments. Description: The FLATS on FIFTH is a new 74 unit luxury community located in the Uptown neighborhood of Pittsburgh and just a short walk to PPG Paints Arena, Duquesne University, UPMC Mercy Hospital and the bustling business district of Downtown Pittsburgh. Amenities include a front desk attendant, lounge, conference/ business center, pet washing facility, gym,package room, bicycle storage & repair station, flat screen TV's & free WiFi in common areas, & garage parking (for a fee). The units include sliding barn doors,washers & dryers, wood grain luxury vinyl flooring, fully equipped kitchens with granite counter tops, electric stoves, disposals, dishwashers, microwaves & refrigerators, large closets and bathrooms, sliding glass doors and or balconies, and electric heat & central air. The FLATS on FIFTH welcomes Pets and offers long & short term leases, furnished and non-furnished units and ADA compatible units. Conveniently located near the hottest restaurants in the city, the sports arenas, concert & art centers, water ways, biking, running & walking trails, public transportation, several universities, hospitals, and interstates 376 & 279.
